description: Lancome Visionnaire Peel 30ml p eel to reveal smooth, even, and radiant skin! This easy to use, leave-on liquid nighttime face peel works to gently exfoliate skin surface cells and address multiple skin concerns: uneven skin texture, appearance of pores, wrinkles and fine lines, and dark spots. Inspired by fitness interval training, Visionnaire Crescendo? combines two different formulas each with their own unique ingredient combination to be used over a 28-night period as part of an interval skin training experience. Start with Phase 1 for the first 14 nights, formulated with 5% bio-acids such as fruit acids and quinoa husk extract that works to reduce the appearance of pores, improve skins texture, and radiance. Then, switch to Phase 2 for the last 14 nights. Formulated with 10% derma-acids, including 0.5% salicylic acid and 9.5% pure glycolic acid , this phase reduces the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles, and dark spots. Repeat the 28-night skin interval training experience as desired.

A sparkling cocktail of marine and floral cues, it will transport you to faraway islands in search of adventure and challenge. The watery, floral aroma of Clone dances with spicy, vivacious star anise, giving way to vibrant juniper berry with undertones of earthy oakmoss and sophisticated cedar wood, in a subtle, seductive call to the rugged adventurer preparing to take on the elements and be at one with nature.

A radiant flower from the verdant wilderness that surpasses all fantasies, a dizzying mix of thorny, earthy prickliness and softly glowing, deceptively innocent beauty. A rose that confuses all the senses and holds infinite mysteries. Rose in Wonderland shines with all facets of the iconic flower. The prickly-green stem is interpreted by currant buds, geranium essence and vetiver, which sound through the fragrance structure from the top note to the finish. The heart oscillates with nuances of a gently glowing rose dew accord and opulent, dark honey-tobacco accents of the legendary Centifolia roses. Velvety white musk and crystal amber complete the fatal, floral-sensual, seductive blossom character. Top Notes: Blackcurrant Heart Notes: Rose, Geranium Base Notes: Tobacco, Vetiver.

And so the citrus scent exudes both joyful, sunny warmth and mineral-foggy coolness and a hint of the raging surf spray on Albion's coast. A fragrance impression full of contrasts, tropical and temperate in the same breath.

Clarins' nutrient-powered plant discovery is the Horse Chestnut plant - known for its incredible longevity, strength, resistance, and rebirth every spring. Two potent parts of the plant - organic flower extract and active fruit molecule, escin - take action to help revive skin. Together, this revitalizing duo provides nourishment and luminosity for healthy-looking skin.

Reinvent the rules of the game and free your movements thanks to the enveloping breath of this Lacoste Intense Eau de Toilette. The gradient color of this perfume bottle reflects the power of the fragrance, while its shape, its petit piqué engraving and its embroidered crocodile recall the iconic L.12.12 polo shirt, invented by René Lacoste. Revolutionizing the sportswear look, it redefines the codes that combine elegance, confidence and dynamism. Echoing this free and daring spirit, Eau Intense L.12.12 Blanc allows everyone to reveal their masculinity with talent and uniqueness, putting the style on the skin, in the relaxed manner of the Lacoste polo shirt.

Top notes of lychee and peonies brighten the accord, while the base of patchouli, vetiver and woods deepen it. Breezy yet earthy, womanly yet young. Contained in a tempered crystal flacon.

title: Guerlain Abeille Royale Advanced Youth Watery Oil
description: Guerlain Abeille Royale Advanced Youth Watery Oil offers the skin all the power of Guerlain-exclusive ingredients: Ouessant Black Bee Honey and exclusive Royal Jelly. This revolutionary formula combines the power of a serum, the richness of an oil and the freshness of a lotion. The skin appears instantly smoother, plumper and revitalized. Replenishing micro-drops of oil* are released at the very last minute, leaving the complexion looking radiant. The skin feels incredibly silky and baby-soft to the touch. *In vitro tests on ingredients.

title: Yves Saint Laurent L`homme Le Parfum
description: Yves Saint Laurent L`homme Le Parfum d iscover a bold and woody fragrance in L'Homme Le Parfum - made for men who are truly magnetic. This Eau De Parfum is a warm and woody interpretation of the classic L'Homme Eau De Toilette. A mix of cardamon, basil, seductive cedarwood YSL brings you a lasting, more intense fragrance for the modern man.

title: Mancera Gold Aoud 120ml
description: Mancera Gold Aoud 120ml is a Floral Woody Musk fragrance for women and men. Top notes are Agarwood (Oud), Mandarin Orange, Black Pepper, Saffron, Bergamot and Lemon; middle notes are Bulgarian Rose, Jasmine and Patchouli; base notes are Amber, White Musk, Sandalwood, Cedar, Madagascar Vanilla, Guaiac Wood and Leather.

title: Yves Saint Laurent La Nuit De L`homme Eau De Parfum
description: Yves Saint Laurent La Nuit De L`homme Eau De Parfum p laying on contrast and overdose, La Nuit de L'Homme Le Parfum opens with a fresh burst of bergamot and anise, immediately followed by the spicy, virile warmth of black pepper. Night invades the atmosphere, and the trap is already closed. Notes of lavender and labdanum release all their power to the trail, an excessively carnai melody made even headier by the sensuality of patchouli and vanilla. Attraction is at its height. Vetiver adds the final note to a fragrance of noble ingredients that is absolutely unique.

title: Guerlain Abeille Royale Cleansing Oil Anti-pollution 150ml
description: Guerlain Abeille Royale Cleansing Oil Anti-pollution 150ml removes all types of makeup, even waterproof, from face, eyes and lips, and helps rid the skin of impurities and pollutant particles. The oil is applied directly to dry skin with the hands and gently massaged in to make makeup removal a moment of pure pleasure. Its ultra-fine texture with honeyed scents transforms on contact with water into a milky emulsion that rinses off easily, without leaving a greasy film. The skin is left fresh, supple and comfortable. Ready to begin the Abeille Royale skincare ritual.

title: Yves Saint Laurent La Nuit De L`homme Eau De Toilette
description: Yves Saint Laurent La Nuit De L`homme Eau De Toilette a story of seduction, intensity and bold sensuality. A darkly handsome man whose irresistible charm and seduction sweep away everything in their path. A fresh oriental fragrance, made of tensions and olfactory clashes. A structure of contrasting forces…A signature rich in differences and dualities…A seduction that lies half-way between restraint and abandon...A fresh Oriental fragrance that rocks the senses: the freshness of Cardamom and the sophistication of Cedar meet the intense sensuality of Coumarin.

title: Guerlain Abeille Royale Daily Repair Serum G2
description: Guerlain Abeille Royale Daily Repair Serum G2 t he unique texture of the Daily Repair Serum delivers a repairing concentrate, made with Guerlain Exclusive Royal Jelly and Pure Ouessant Honey, that acts continuously on every key level of the skin* for complete firmness. From the cutaneous tissue through to the surface the skin fills out. Elasticity – Tone – Reshaping – Wrinkles : the skin looks younger from the very 1st drops and the face is lastingly remodeled.

title: Mancera Purple Flowers Edp For Women 120ml
description: Mancera Purple Flowers Edp For Women 120ml is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women and men.The nose behind this fragrance is Pierre Montale. Top notes are Pear, Angelica, Black Currant, Pink Pepper, Clove and Mandarin Orange; middle notes are Tuberose, Jasmine, Neroli and Rose; base notes are Vanilla and White Musk.

title: Clarins My Clarins My Perfect Eyebrow Palette
description: Clarins My Clarins My Perfect Eyebrow Palette a n eyebrow shaping kit—contains nourishing Organic Coconut oil powders—lets you highlight and define your ideal brows: visibly thicker, more even, and perfectly arched.

title: Clarins My Clarins Micellar Cleansing Water 200ml
description: Clarins My Clarins Micellar Cleansing Water 200ml a plant-based micellar cleansing water for clean, clear, refreshed skin in one step - no need to rinse. Formulated with tiny micellar cleansing spheres to gently cleanse and dissolve makeup, oil, and impurities from face, eyes, and lips. Mild enough for the most sensitive skin. Soothing formula, with fruity-floral notes, contains a refreshing cocktail of pollution-fighting Moringa, and calming Organic Golden Gentian extract to keep your skin healthy-looking, radiant, and refined.

title: Clarins Cleansing Micellar Water 200ml
description: Clarins Cleansing Micellar Water 200ml is a fresh, lightweight water ideal for anyone looking for a quick cleansing solution, even those with the most sensitive skin. Enriched with Micelles, this floral fruity scented water contains a Gentle Complex, harvested from Le Domaine Clarins, made up of Organic Yellow Gentian Extract and Organic Lemon Balm Extract to help soothe and calm the skin and preserve the skin microbiota.

title: Yves Saint Laurent Libre Intense Woman Eau De Parfum
description: Yves Saint Laurent Libre Intense Woman Eau De Parfum l IBRE Eau de Parfum Intense is the new, more sensual take on the iconic Eau de Parfum. The signature notes of lavender essence from France and Moroccan orange blossom combine with glowing orchid and warm vanilla to push the perfume to the extreme. It is a long-lasting unique twist on the floral fragrance.

title: Yves Saint Laurent Libre Woman Eau De Parfum
description: Yves Saint Laurent Libre Woman Eau De Parfum , the new Eau De Parfum by Yves Saint Laurent, represents the freedom to live everything to excess. Your boundless creativity, your complete emancipation, your ever-evolving femininity. The perfume of a strong, bold and free woman experiencing her freedom at its most empowered extreme. The first floral lavender. The tension between the burning sensuality of an orange blossom from Morocco & the boldness of a lavender from France with a feminine twist. A singular trail like a breath of freedom.

title: Yves Saint Laurent Libre Woman Eau De Toilette
description: Yves Saint Laurent Libre Woman Eau De Toilette is a bright and floral women's fragrance. A fresh interpretation of the iconic Eau de Parfum, this feminine perfume has bursts of French Lavender Essence and Moroccan Orange Blossom that combine with an icy White Tea Accord to create a modern and youthful scent.

title: Clarins Soothing Toning Lotion 200ml
description: Clarins Soothing Toning Lotion 200ml balances very dry or sensitive skin types whilst also removing excess cleanser residue. The fruity floral toner is created with a combination of Camomile and Purple Coneflower which work together to sooth tight skin, ease discomfort and reduce redness.

title: Yves Saint Laurent Libre Woman Hair Mist 30ml
description: Yves Saint Laurent Libre Woman Hair Mist 30ml a n innovative air like formula delicately refreshing & perfuming the hair with the scent of libre. The original Eau de parfum enriched with Pomegranate Extract from the YSL Ourika community gardens. The product leaves the hair brighter, softer and with a natural silk like finish

title: Guerlain Abeille Royale Fortifying Lotion With Royal Jelly 150ml
description: Guerlain Abeille Royale Fortifying Lotion With Royal Jelly 150ml 25 times more concentrated in royal jelly(1) thanks to microencapsulation, the Fortifying Lotion helps the skin resist various stressors and pollution which visibly affect its quality and beauty. Formulated for all skin types, even sensitive, It resets the skin so that it recovers its optimum condition : rebalanced, hydrated, supple and radiant.

title: Clarins Purifying Toning Lotion 200ml
description: Clarins Purifying Toning Lotion 200ml balances combination to oily skin types by limiting the over production of sebum whilst also removing excess cleanser residue. This floral fruity toner is created with a combination of Meadowsweet and Witch Hazel which work together to reduce shine, visible pores and brighten the skins complexion.

title: Clarins Uv Plus SPF 50 Rose
description: Clarins Uv Plus SPF 50 Rose protection against 5 pollutants encountered in everyday life: atmospheric, indoor, pollen, blue light and photo-pollution. A lightweight, easily-absorbed gel cream for an instant rosy glow. Powered by organic mango leaf extract, it enhances the skin's self-defence by 64%. Hydrates and cares for skin, thanks to its 74% skin-caring ingredients.

title: Guerlain Abeille Royale Hand Balm 40ml
description: Guerlain Abeille Royale Hand Balm 40ml the youth repairing hand balm with honey concentrate intensely nourishes dry and weakened hands. Its rich and melting balm formula is quickly absorbed, without a sticky finish. Hands are soft, smooth and look visibly younger.

title: Clarins Lip Comfort Oil Shimmer
description: Clarins Lip Comfort Oil Shimmer offers bright colour and 3D shine thanks to its combination of intense pigments and highly-concentrated fine shimmer: your lips are visibly plumped and enhanced. It also doesn't sacrifice care: its ultra-rich trio of oils nourishes, comforts and protects the lips.

title: Clarins Hydra Essentiel Hydrating Mist 75ml
description: Clarins Hydra Essentiel Hydrating Mist 75ml a Hydrating Face Mist Formulated With 98% Natural Ingredientsthat Moisturizes, Refreshes And Protects Skin From Dehydration And Discomfort Caused By Environmental Stressors. Enriched With Hyaluronic Acid, Super-Quenching Organic Leaf Of Life And Organic Houseleek Extracts, Plus Our Plant-Based Anti-Pollution Complexthat Protects Skin From The Damaging And Aging Effects Of Daily Thermal Shocks: Sudden Temperature Changes, Caused By Humidity, Air-Conditioning And Central Heating. This Fine Double Action Mist Can Be Used To Hydrate The Skin Before Applying Makeup, Or Over Makeup As A Final Touch, And Any Time Of The Day For Soft, Radiant, Dewy-Fresh Skin. The Perfect Complement To Your Daily Skincare Routine.

title: Clarins My Clarins Re-boost Healthy Glow Tinted Gel-cream 50ml
description: Clarins My Clarins Re-boost Healthy Glow Tinted Gel-cream 50ml is a light, natural-looking tinted moisturiser. The non-sticky, super fresh gel-cream contains an energizing morning cocktail of fruits extracts to boost skin’s hydration, help rebalance and boost radiance. The formula has the same hydrating, pollution protection ingredients of as the My Clarins RE-BOOST day creams, with the addition of micro-pigments and rose pearls to diminish signs of fatigue for a healthy, glowing complexion.

title: Clarins Soothing Gentle Foaming Cleanser 125ml
description: Clarins Soothing Gentle Foaming Cleanser 125ml is tailored to your skin type and concerns. Soothing Gentle Foaming Cleanser is suitable for very dry or sensitive skin types thanks to shea butter and chamomile extract which comfort and soothe the skin. The anti-pollution formula is now even greener than ever with the two key alpine herb ingredients, gentian and lemon balm now being harvested from the Domaine Clarins, the open-air laboratory in the heart of the alps. The thick cream texture lathers upon contact with water to remove all traces of make-up and impurities, whilst also protecting from dehydration and helping to limit the drying effects of hard water. Skin is left feeling soft and soothed.

title: Clarins Clarinsmen Energizing Gel 50ml
description: Clarins Clarinsmen Energizing Gel 50ml is the ideal treatment for men who lead an intense life. A real dose of energy, vitality and hydration for tired skin. The powerful action of organic red ginseng extract contributes to the energy production of the skin to energize, stimulate it and allow it to resist all kinds of aggressions (extreme temperatures, exhaustion and stress). For a radiant complexion and rested skin, without features of fatigue, and more toned.

title: Guerlain Abeille Royale Hand Lotion 40ml
description: Guerlain Abeille Royale Hand Lotion 40ml a no-rinse hygiene gel tested on sensitive skin. Specially formulated to cleanse hands while keeping them hydrated. Gel texture is quickly absorbed by skin without leaving a sticky film or residue. Contains alcohol & a blend of carefully selected honeys: Guerlain’s exclusive Ouessant Island honey, Corsican honey & New Zealand clover honey. Infused with fresh & airy honeyed scents to boost the mood. Leaves hands feeling soft & smooth with no sticky finish. No need to rinse. Presented in an elegant, easy-to-use tube.

title: Guerlain Abeille Royale Honey Cataplasm Mask 60g
description: Guerlain Abeille Royale Honey Cataplasm Mask 60g i nspired by honey dressings, the Honey Cataplasm Mask Abeille Royale by Guerlain is the latest-generation cataplasm mask ; it adheres to the skin ideally and moulds itself to the facial contours. The result: the skin is instantly smoothed*, wrinkles and fine lines are visibly diminished*, the face appears rested, the skin is hydrated and plumper. The skin is more luminous**. *Instrumental test, 16 women **Clinical assessment on 32 women.

title: Yves Saint Laurent Mon Paris Woman Eau De Parfum
description: Yves Saint Laurent Mon Paris Woman Eau De Parfum c apturing the spirit of an intense love affair that lives in the euphoria of the moment, YSL Beauté introduces Mon Paris perfume - a new expression of love today, inspired by the city of lovers, Paris. Mon Paris is a fragrance which urges you to seize the moment; transcend the present; and prepare to fall head over heels into the arms of a passionate love. A subversive reinvention of the traditional chypre, the new floral perfume turns the traditional model upside down, by introducing a brave, bold narcotic white chypre fit for love today.

title: Clarins Clarinsmen Energizing Eye Gel 15ml
description: Clarins Clarinsmen Energizing Eye Gel 15ml a n anti-fatigue, roll-on eye gel for men that delivers an instant shot of energy to tired eyes, visibly reducing dark circles and puffiness to leave eyes looking smoothed, revitalized, and refreshed. A powerhouse blend of Organic Red Ginseng extract and potent plant ingredients targets signs of fatigue and oxidative stress from environmental aggressors such as pollution and harmful UV rays

title: Guerlain Abeille Royale Mattifying Day Cream 50ml
description: Guerlain Abeille Royale Mattifying Day Cream 50ml combines BlackBee Repair technology with a sebum-regulating and protective Propolis Complex* to visibly firm the skin, correct wrinkles and imperfections. It is specially formulated to help rebalance combination to oily skin. Day after day, the pores appear tightened, the skin texture looks refined, the complexion seems evened out. The Cream's light texture melts on the skin, leaving a matte finish

title: Yves Saint Laurent Splendid Wood Collection Eau De Parfum 75ml
description: Yves Saint Laurent Splendid Wood Collection Eau De Parfum 75ml a range of five opulent fragrances that each evokes oriental inspirations that have deeply nourished Mr. Yves Saint Laurent. Inspired by the moucharabieh of the orient, in Splendid Wood the fusing of cardamom structures the fragrance while the cedar wood enhances a brown oriental palette of colours .

title: Clarins V Shaping Facial Lift Eye Concentrate Serum 15ml
description: Clarins V Shaping Facial Lift Eye Concentrate Serum 15ml a n eye serum that visibly tightens and reduces the appearance of puffiness and dark circles for a brighter,wide-awake look. Clarins puffiness-targeting phyto complex : 3 plant extracts help to reduce the look of puffy-looking eyes. Organic agropyron extract helps to visibly lift and redefine eye contours. Lady’s Mantle extract helps minimize the appearance of dark circles. High-tech cooling tip for a fresh-eyed look in seconds.

title: Mavala Cuticle Remover 10ml
description: Mavala Cuticle Remover 10ml Its thixotropic formula softens and helps remove overgrown cuticles in one application. Apply directly on cuticles with the brush. In a few seconds overgrown cuticles are softened and can be "erased" with the manicure stick wrapped with cotton .

title: Guerlain Abeille Royale Replenishing Eye Cream 15ml
description: Guerlain Abeille Royale Replenishing Eye Cream 15ml targets the appearance of wrinkles around the eyes, from fine surface lines to frown lines and crow's feet, for a visibly rejuvenated eye area, day after day.

title: Yves Saint Laurent Y Intense Man Eau De Parfum
description: Yves Saint Laurent Y Intense Man Eau De Parfum introducing Y Eau de Parfum Intense, a cologne for men with a powerful and highly sensual interpretation of the Y signature scent.Y Eau de Parfum Intense amplifies the iconic blend to the extreme by spicing it up with blue juniper berries. Vibrant lavender from France is contrasted by the deep and rich woody notes of patchouli from Bali for a fresh fragrance that is intensely powerful. A deep blue sexy and clean scent with all-day long intensity in a spray.

title: Clarins Self Tan Glow Booster For Body 30ml
description: Clarins Self Tan Glow Booster For Body 30ml e asy-to-apply self tanning booster for the body—formulated with 99% ingredients of natural origin— delivers an even, long-lasting tan 365 days a year. The concentrated formula builds in intensity with every drop, so you control the glow—from sun-touched to deep bronze—for natural-looking, customizable results. Just 4-6 tanning drops mixed with any body moisturizer, and you’re golden!

title: Yves Saint Laurent Y Le Man Eau De Parfum
description: Yves Saint Laurent Y Le Man Eau De Parfum is a sensual and intoxicating men’s fragrance by Yves Saint Laurent Beauté. An intense interpretation of the Y signature scent, this men’s cologne is a new twist on the white and dark fougere that combines the bold, woody notes of Geranium and Cedarwood with fresh Lavender.

title: Mavala Mava Dry 10ml
description: Mavala Mava Dry 10ml dries nail polish in seconds (touch-dry) : important manicure time-saver. It will enhance colour and give a protecting sheen that prevents nail polish from chipping.

title: Yves Saint Laurent Y Man Eau De Parfum
description: Yves Saint Laurent Y Man Eau De Parfum Y by Yves Saint Laurent is not the story of one man but of a whole generation: a creative generation of men who dare to follow their passions and carve their own paths. From inspiration, through hard work and collaboration, to self-accomplishment and success. The Y EAU DE PARFUM man has accomplished his dreams and is moving towards a new tomorrow. He’s a man willing to share his ideas with a focus on improving the world; a man established, confident and capable of facing the challenges presented to him. He’s one step further on the route to accomplishment.

title: Yves Saint Laurent Y Man Eau De Toilette
description: Yves Saint Laurent Y Man Eau De Toilette , now newly renovated with new formulation and updated design. A mineral woody fragrance for men, with vibrant lavender, crisp geranium and warm cedarwood.

title: Yves Saint Laurent Y Women Eau De Toilette 80ml
description: Yves Saint Laurent Y Women Eau De Toilette 80ml t he top note is almost cold through the presence of a fused spicy note combined with the freshness of bergamot. Then come sumptuous, silky soft notes of white flower. At the heart lies quintessentially elegant iris, a flower with woody overtones. The base opens onto a note of oak moss which is the hallmark of the elegance of chypre fragrances, associated with patchouli. Deep, vibrant and intense, patchouli accompanies the floral note to create a mysterious and exciting trail which leaves quite remarkable presence.

title: Memo Paris Inle Hair Perfume For Women 80ml
description: Memo Paris Inle Hair Perfume For Women 80ml for hair exposed to the wind of Ireland, the sun of Italy and the sky of Paris.

title: Memo Paris Luxor Oud Edp 75ml
description: Memo Paris Luxor Oud Edp 75ml t op notes: Patchouli, Mandarin orange. Heart notes: Fruits, Desert rose. Base notes: Agarwood (oud), Labdanum.

title: Clarins Ombre 4 Colour Eye Palette Golden Hour Gradation
description: Clarins Ombre 4 Colour Eye Palette Golden Hour Gradation m ake your eyes stand out with this exceptional 4-Colour Eye Palette! Its customisable bronzing shades allows you to create intense or natural looks and play with the different finishes: velvet, satin, metallic or an ultra-shiny glossy effect. A 2-in-1 blush with an integrated base! Key ingredient: Bamboo Powder – known to improve make-up wear

title: Clarins Exfoliating Body Scrub For Smooth Skin 200ml
description: Clarins Exfoliating Body Scrub For Smooth Skin 200ml r efreshing body scrub that gently smoothes away dry cells, flakes, and impurities while nourishing and softening skin. Formulated with naturally exfoliating Bamboo Powders and soothing extracts of Mimosa Tenuiflora and Shea Butter, this non-drying scrub leaves skin soft, supple, and smooth. Preps skin to fully absorb the benefits of treatments to follow.

title: Guerlain Abeille Royale Uv Shield 50ml
description: Guerlain Abeille Royale Uv Shield 50ml ensures daily skin protection: it is the high-protection sun care solution against UVB thanks to SPF 50 protection and against UVA thanks to PA++++ protection, including long UVA rays, the spectra responsible for collagen fibre deterioration. Its Flex UV technology creates an ultra-resistant second-skin mesh compatible with the filters and delivers advanced protection. Concentrating the youth-repairing powers of our exclusive honeys thanks to the Dynamic Blackbee Repair technology, this fluid – a lightly tinted fine and fresh emulsion – helps to reduce the visible signs of collagen degradation: wrinkles and loss of firmness. Enriched with radiance-restoring white honey, UV Skin Defense revives the complexion's luminosity and visibly reduces the appearance of dark spots.

title: Guerlain Abielle Royale Double R Renew & Repair Eye Serum 20ml
description: Guerlain Abielle Royale Double R Renew & Repair Eye Serum 20ml i nspired by dermo-cosmetic care, Double R Renew & Repair Eye Serum combines the power of two exclusive technologies to illuminate and resculpt the eye area – eye contour, eyelids and eyelashes – in a single step. The eye area is brighter, all types of dark circles (pigmented and sunken) and puffiness are visibly reduced. Wrinkles and fine lines are smoothed, the eye contour appears resculpted and lashes seem denser. Formulated with 95% naturally-derived ingredients¹.

title: Clarins Calm Essentiel Soothing Emulsion 50ml
description: Clarins Calm Essentiel Soothing Emulsion 50ml a new range suited to the needs of sensitive and fragile skin. Featuring 95% to 98% natural ingredients, these formulas have an excellent affinity with the skin. A truly enveloping treatment, the soothing Emulsion calms sensations of skin discomfort (dryness, tightness). Its creamy texture melts into the skin, intensely moisturizing and protecting it. The skin is quickly comforted and radiant—plus, its tolerance threshold improves day after day.

title: Guerlain Aqua Allegoria Bergamote Calabria Woman Eau De Toilette 125ml
description: Guerlain Aqua Allegoria Bergamote Calabria Woman Eau De Toilette 125ml belongs to the Aqua Allegoria collection, the first collection of intensely fresh fragrances in perfumery created in 1999. On the strength of the Guerlain Perfumer’s expertise dating back to the legendary Eau de Cologne Impériale in 1853, the Guerlain Perfumer creates each of the Aqua Allegoria with the freshness of a Cologne and the hold of a Guerlain perfume. The guiding thread of the collection is bergamot, a precious citrus fruit, “Calabrian green gold”, a key ingredient in the Guerlinade.

title: Guerlain Aqua Allegoria Flora Cherrysia Woman Eau De Toilette 125lml
description: Guerlain Aqua Allegoria Flora Cherrysia Woman Eau De Toilette 125lml belongs to the Aqua Allegoria collection, the first collection of intensely fresh fragrances in perfumery created in 1999.

title: Clarins Extra Firming Energy Radiance Boosting, Winkle Control Day Cream 50ml
description: Clarins Extra Firming Energy Radiance Boosting, Winkle Control Day Cream 50ml i t’s the day cream that has it all for super active and often overwhelmed women in their 40s. This 2-in-1 treatment combines Clarins expertise in firmness with the enhancing effect of a radiance cream. When the skin is subjected to a fast-paced lifestyle, it becomes dull, fatigued, and wrinkles appear... Extra-Firming Energy is the answer, as it helps restore the skin's firmness and creates a revitalised, radiant complexion! And of course, each application provides a dose of well-being and a sensory experience, thanks to its creamy texture and fresh, energising scent. Finally, a treatment that puts the spring back in your skin and your step! Your firm skin will be positively glowing! Skin type: All Skin Types

title: Guerlain Aqua Allegoria Flora Salvaggia Woman Eau De Toilette 125ml
description: Guerlain Aqua Allegoria Flora Salvaggia Woman Eau De Toilette 125ml is part of the Aqua Allegoria collection by Guerlain, fresh Eaux de Toilette with sophisticated trails inviting you to a sensory escape. The collection offers a profusion of unexpected notes to reveal the beauty of bergamot, a precious citrus fruit and the “green gold of Calabria”.

title: Clarins My Clarins Re Boost Instant Reviving Mask 50ml
description: Clarins My Clarins Re Boost Instant Reviving Mask 50ml a refreshing, 10-minute face mask that intensely hydrates the skin, visibly reduces signs of fatigue, and restores radiance. The icy, cream-gel mask is formulated with 88% natural ingredients—including super-quenching Organic Leaf of Life and Organic Quinoa extracts, plus radiance-boosting escin from Horse Chestnut—to awaken tired skin that looks dull and puffy due to lack of sleep. My Clarins exclusive Healthy In & Out Complex of nourishing Organic Coconut water and detoxifying Organic Alpenrose extract leaves skin looking healthy, hydrated, and revived. The blue, creamy gel with a moisture-rich texture delivers an invigorating, cooling effect upon contact. Your VEGAN recipe—free of phthalates, parabens, and sulfates—to minimize signs of fatigue for refreshed, radiant skin. My Clarins is free of all animal-derived ingredients and was not tested on animals. Skin type: All skin types Texture: Cream-Gel Use: Use 1-2 times per week, as needed.

title: Clarins Ever Matte Loose Powder
description: Clarins Ever Matte Loose Powder is perfect for setting and enhancing your make-up for an ultra-natural and matte finish. The powder will set make-up to help it last longer, whilst blurring imperfections. The skin care powered formula contains bamboo powder extract to mattify and peach milk to soften and hydrate. Enriched with Clarins Anti-Pollution complex. Skin type: All Skin Types

title: Guerlain Aqua Allegoria Forte Rosa Rossa Woman Eau De Parfum
description: Guerlain Aqua Allegoria Forte Rosa Rossa Woman Eau De Parfum majestically blooming sweet roses bathed in light, paired with a juicy white peach over a deliciously woody base. Aqua Allegoria Forte, the intense collection, is a warm and enveloping journey to the heart of the world’s wonders: Eaux de Parfum celebrating the intense beauty of nature, revealed by the golden rays of a setting sun.

title: Clarins Total Eye Contour Gel 20ml
description: Clarins Total Eye Contour Gel 20ml c larins’ cooling, non-oily eye contour gel minimises the look of puffiness and dark circles—refreshing, hydrating and resting the delicate skin around eyes. Formulated with purifying plant extracts and caffeine, it helps to erase signs of tiredness: the eye contour is toned and its radiance enhanced. This gel for dark circles is suitable for all eye types, even sensitive eyes.

title: Clarins Total Eye Hydrate 20ml
description: Clarins Total Eye Hydrate 20ml a super-hydrating cooling balm-mask for fresh and revived eyes in just 10 minutes. With its cream-gel texture and a cooling formula, it helps to reduce signs of dehydration and fatigue for instantly brighter-looking eyes. Contains organic leaf of life to boost skin’s ability to retain moisture, as well as Irish moss which soothes the skin, and horse chestnut which boosts radiance.

title: Guerlain Aqua Allegoria Orange Soleia Woman Eau De Toilette 125ml
description: Guerlain Aqua Allegoria Orange Soleia Woman Eau De Toilette 125ml an aromatic unisex citrus fragrance. Contains notes of red orange, peppermint, tonka bean, pink pepper, bergamot & woody accord Launched in 2020 Suitable for spring or summer..

title: Mercedes-benz Club Fresh For Men
description: Mercedes-benz Club Fresh For Men t he composition is based on woody and oriental notes that permeate the air with the piquancy of vanilla, delight the nose with the sweetness of benzoin and the serenity of ambroxan, which gives off a warm breeze of submission. Around rather soft basic chords, the exclusive dances lead slightly distant accents of passionate jasmine and philosophical chants of incense, which emphasize the extraordinary character of the owner of this perfume.

title: Mercedes-benz Man Edt For Men

title: Clarins Total Eye Revive 15ml
description: Clarins Total Eye Revive 15ml b esides targeting fine lines around the eye contour, this gel-cream helps visibly reduce signs of fatigue (puffiness and dark circles) instantly and day after day. Its gel texture works with the cryo-metallic tip to help the eye look instantly decongested and is perfectly adapted to this part of the face which often appears "puffy". Signs of fatigue are minimised, fine lines are visibly smoothed. Skin type: Normal, Oily, Combination, Dry Texture: Cream-Gel

title: Clarins Total Eye Smooth 15ml
description: Clarins Total Eye Smooth 15ml e nriched with skin-firming plant extracts, this eye contour product combines the smoothing effect of a serum with the comfort of a balm. It targets undereye puffiness and dark circles so eyes regain a youthful, revitalised look. It also offers a reviving effect thanks to a new generation of pearls that provide luminosity and a smoothing texture. Its discreet fragrance is scented with rose and camellia and leaves behind a pleasant feeling of freshness on the skin. Skin type: Normal, Oily, Combination, Dry Texture: Balm

title: Vichy 48-hour Intensive Anti-perspirant Treatment Roll-on
description: Vichy 48-hour Intensive Anti-perspirant Treatment Roll-on i ntensive Anti-Perspirant Treatment providing a powerful 48-hour protection, leaving you with a long-lasting feeling of freshness. For men and women that suffer from intense perspiration, who want to combine a long-term anti-perspirant that is effective in fighting odours and comfortable for their skin.

title: Clarins Nutri Lumiere Revive 50ml
description: Clarins Nutri Lumiere Revive 50ml is a skin tone enhancing and revitalising day cream that illuminates and corrects any sallowness of the skin. description: Clarins Lotus Face Oil 30ml purifying face treatment oil, formulated with 100% plant extracts, is a natural astringent for oily or combination skin. An aromatic blend of essential oils—including Lotus, Rosemary, and Organic Geranium—hydrates, tones and visibly tightens pores for a refined skin texture. Hazelnut Oil, rich in Omega 9 and Vitamin E, softens, soothes and seals in moisture to minimize the appearance of fine lines. Fine, lightweight formula is absorbed instantly.

title: Clarins Relax Body Treatment Oil 100ml
description: Clarins Relax Body Treatment Oil 100ml with 100% pure plant extracts, including Geranium, Petit Grain, Camomile and Basil — helps relieve stress and fatigue for a total feeling of well-being. Hazelnut Oil locks in moisture to leave body skin soft and satin-smooth. Helps soothe tired muscles after exercise. Preservative-free.

title: Clarins Tonic Bath & Shower Concentrate 200ml
description: Clarins Tonic Bath & Shower Concentrate 200ml i nvigorating gel body wash that leaves every inch of skin soft, clean, and beautifully conditioned. Revitalizes skin and senses with energizing, aromatic essential oils of Rosemary, Field Mint, and Organic Horse Chestnut extract for a visible toning effect. Sensorial gel formula—with gently cleansing Organic Soapwort extract—water activates into a fine, lightweight foam that rinses easily, leaving skin comfortable, smooth and delicately perfumed for a spa-fresh feeling of well-being. Silky lather is gentle enough for the most sensitive skin.

title: Clarins Eau Des Jardins 100ml
description: Clarins Eau Des Jardins 100ml is a surprising combination of essential oils and plant extracts with phytotherapeutic benefits. The sparkling freshness of fruity skins, an integrating note with wild rose and the scent of delicious wood.

title: Clarins Eau Ressourcante Treatment Fragrance 100ml
description: Clarins Eau Ressourcante Treatment Fragrance 100ml c larins brings your world into beautiful balance with an aromatic caress of soothing, pure plant extracts. Essential oils of Basil, Iris, Cedarwood and Sarsparilla promote a feeling of total relaxation while locking in a delicate veil of scented moisture. Non-photosensitizing formula is safe enough to wear in the sun. Spray on over Tranquility Bath & Shower Milk and Tranquility Moisturizing Body Lotion to create an atmosphere of "aah spa" calm.

title: Clarins Gentle Exfoliator Brightening Toner 125ml
description: Clarins Gentle Exfoliator Brightening Toner 125ml is described as a fresh fluid exfoliating lotion that brightens, smooths and softens the skin. Regular use of the toner is said to help strengthen the skin’s resistance to wrinkles and maintain the balance between preventing a build-up of dead cells and encouraging cell renewal. The toner contains tamarind fruit acids which work to eliminate impurities and dead skin cells as well as boosting cellular renewal, and white nettle extract to tighten the pores.

title: Mavala Gel Finish Top Coat 10ml
description: Mavala Gel Finish Top Coat 10ml "gel effect" fixator gives your manicure extra-volume, smoothness and extra-gloss. Its transparent gel texture replicates the finish of a gel manicure, creates a volumizing magnifying effect, a perfect domed finish and an exceptional ultra glossy shine. Its formula respects the structure and the integrity of the natural nail, does not use a UV lamp and is removed with a classic nail polish remover.

title: Mavala Mava Dry Spray 150ml
description: Mavala Mava Dry Spray 150ml Dries nail polish to a touch-dry surface in seconds and enhances color. A clever blending of resins, solvents and plastifiers. Provides a protecting sheen. Protects nail polish and prevents it from chipping. Essential product for today’s busy woman.

title: Mavala Stop Pen 4.4ml
description: Mavala Stop Pen 4.4ml has been specifically developed to help break the habit of putting fingers in the mouth, and restore and keep beautiful nails. It is an applicator pen moistened with a bitter tasting aqueous solution, enriched with a botanical extract that nourishes cuticles and soothes nail contour. Nails and their contour will regain a beautiful and well-cared for appearance. A handy and nomadic format to take everywhere with you.

title: Trussardi 1911 Donna Woman Eau De Parfum
description: Trussardi 1911 Donna Woman Eau De Parfum is inspired by the enveloping femininity of its bright white bottle featuring golden accents. This scent will take your senses on a journey from purity to passion. On the first inhale, you catch fruity hints created by the vibrant notes of yuzu, slightly unripe citron and the freshness of water fruit. The middle notes unfold through the light hints of white flowers, the sunny character of orange blossoms and the sophistication of jasmine tea, finishing off with delicate water lily. The base notes envelope the nose with their intense woody nuances. Trussardi Donna pulls the veil back on an irresistibly seductive fragrance.

title: Trussardi 1911 Donna Woman Eau De Toilette
description: Trussardi 1911 Donna Woman Eau De Toilette contains a delicate fragrance inspired by the floral oriental olfactory family. The top notes of yuzu, citron and water fruit create an intense, fruity blend. The distinctive feminine quality of the fragrance blooms in the middle notes of orange blossom, water lily and jasmine tea. A sensual texture explodes in the base notes of cedar and sandalwood, which are gently softened by the vanilla and enhanced by the delicate white patchouli finish. This pyramid of notes create a fragrance that represents the woman who wants to bring the elegant and refined sensuality of the East to mind.

title: Trussardi 1911 Uomo Man Eau De Toilette
description: Trussardi 1911 Uomo Man Eau De Toilette embodies an elegant, yet contemporary fragrance which conveys the sophistication of the Italian spirit. The top notes consist of an accord of scents inspired by aromas typical to Italy, such as lemon, galbanum and bergamot. These aromas take us to the middle notes of violet and geranium, creating a striking blend. The finish reveals notes of clary sage, leather and patchouli, which add a feeling of luxury and texture to this fiery, seductive fragrance. The mysterious black bottle epitomises strength and class and the result is powerful and decisive.

title: Trussardi Black Extreme Man Eau De Toilette
description: Trussardi Black Extreme Man Eau De Toilette is the scent for modern, successful men always in pursuit of powerful experiences. Tradition and the spirit of belonging meld with the elegant, timeless design to convey Trussardi’s excellence in its field and premium Italian quality. The fragrance is built around aristocratic black leather with intense, fine woody notes of vetiver and patchouli. The contrast between the lemon notes and the marine accord collides with the fruity notes of plum and iris, enhancing the unique, tenebrous feel, surrounded by dark, sensual and intriguing nuances.

title: Trussardi Delicate Rose Woman Eau De Toilette
description: Trussardi Delicate Rose Woman Eau De Toilette i t's love at first “scent” with Trussardi Delicate Rose. The freshness of the fragrance exudes femininity and vitality through its elegant and graceful bouquet. The notes of kumquat, yuzu and noble bamboo light up the senses with their sharp freshness. The central accord of rose petals, jasmine and lotus flower combines with crisp hints of apple to add character and spontaneity. Musk wraps around you like an embrace on the finish, softening the sophisticated notes of whitewood, while the cedar and sandalwood provide the piece de resistance to this sensory experience, expressing innate sensuality.

title: Trussardi Donna Levriero Collection Woman Eau De Parfum Intense 100ml
description: Trussardi Donna Levriero Collection Woman Eau De Parfum Intense 100ml w ith the enchanting and scintillating notes of yuzu zest and citron, the new Trussardi Donna Levriero Collection perfume unwinds in a whirl of velvety, persuasive hints enclosed in the scent of orange blossoms and jasmine. Its intense and intriguing character is softened by the freshness of the water lilies, then melts away into a fascinating symphony of white patchouli and cedar wood. The femininity of Trussardi woman is enhanced by the sensual fragrances of persistent and unforgettable sandalwood and vanilla. The white bottle with golden Levriero cap is sure to become a collector’s piece.

title: Montale Roses Hair Mist 100ml For Women
description: Montale Roses Hair Mist 100ml For Women s oft , clean skin-loving musk that caresses the senses. Blended together with a hint of sweetness to create a rose scent that is absolutely divine and astonishingly airy and light. Like a flawless diamond in a solitaire setting, sometimes it's best to leave perfection uncluttered. Simply lovely.

description: Moschino Fresh Couture Edt a surprising and ironic product, Fresh Couture fragrance plays with fresh and joyful accents. Its sparkling top notes of mandarin and bergamot are enriched with exotic ylang-ylang. Juicy raspberry provides contrast to the floral heart of velvety white peony and osmanthus. title: Trussardi Donna Pink Marina Woman Eau De Toilette 100ml
description: Trussardi Donna Pink Marina Woman Eau De Toilette 100ml a romantic, sparkling, and salty floral included in the Trussardi family in June 2020. The latest flanker features the summery aura of Trussardi Donna launched under the license of Angelini Beauty in Italy. perfume evoking a summer day at the seaside, where sparkling notes of pink grapefruit and joyful lemon blend with addictive hints of melon sorbet. Floral notes of sea daffodil and broom are enriched by precious tonalities of neroli while a sea salt accord brings vibes and light. The sensual character of creamy sandalwood envelops the deep notes of patchouli and cedar wood creating an enveloping yet unique signature.

title: Trussardi My Land Man Eau De Toilette
description: Trussardi My Land Man Eau De Toilette expresses the distinctive features and the very heart and sole of the centenary brand that it represents. The name harks back to the feeling of belonging and connection with your own land, expressed in the fragrance’s notes. The powerful woody notes mingle with the leather, bergamot and green mandarin to create an original and vibrant olfactory experience, while the refined lavender notes juxtapose with the unexpected hint of calone on the finish. The designer bottle features a stylish grip detail around the sides in real Italian leather embossed with Trussardi’s elegant emblem

title: Petal Fresh Watermelon With Hyaluronic Acid Facial Cleanser 200ml
description: Petal Fresh Watermelon With Hyaluronic Acid Facial Cleanser 200ml pure Hydrating Facial Cleanser is full of natural and key ingredients that gently cleanses skin while locking in moisture. The powerful combination of Watermelon, Hyaluronic Acid and Peach Extract deep cleans pores of dirt, oil and makeup without stripping or over-drying skin. Skin will feel clean, soft and more hydrated. Use daily, morning and night.

title: Petal Fresh Tea Tree With Salicylic Acid Facial Cleanser 200ml
description: Petal Fresh Tea Tree With Salicylic Acid Facial Cleanser 200ml pure Blemish Control Facial Cleanser if full of natural and key ingredients that gently cleanse skin while targeting blemishes. The powerful combination of Tea Tree, Salicylic Acid and Peppermint deep cleans pores of dirt, oil and makeup without stripping or over-drying skin. Skin will feel clean, refreshed and more visibly clear. Use daily, morning and night.

title: Petal Fresh Papaya With Vitamin C Facial Cleanser 200ml
description: Petal Fresh Papaya With Vitamin C Facial Cleanser 200ml pure Brightening Facial Cleanser is full of natural and key ingredients that gently cleanses skin while improving uneven skin tone to reveal skin’s true luminosity. The powerful combination of Papaya, Vitamin C and Pink Grapefruit deep cleans pores of dirt, oil and makeup without stripping or over-drying skin. Skin will feel clean, refreshed and more radiant. Use daily, morning and night.

title: Trussardi My Scent Woman Eau De Toilette
description: Trussardi My Scent Woman Eau De Toilette contains a fragrance featuring a delicate floral bouquet combined with the sensuality of noble ingredients that tell the story of timeless femininity. It opens with white flowers, orange and jasmine, setting off on a journey of exploration through the female world, gathering dreams and emotions, caught by the scent of nashi pear. The middle notes transport you towards romanticism with sweet lilac and intense rosebuds. The base notes feature the unmistakeable molecule known as serenolide that makes the finish fruity and vibrant with the contemporary nuance of soft, velvety musk and honey.

title: Trussardi Pure Jasmine 90ml
description: Trussardi Pure Jasmine 90ml t russardi announces the release of a "new eau de parfum for iconic women," called Trussardi Pure Jasmine. It is a new addition to the Trussardi feminine collection and is dedicated to the values of modern femininity. Pure Jasmine was specifically composed for women born in the 1980s and who understand that today's feminist means "following the rules of behavior and language based on individualism, sustainability, and inclusiveness," according to the brand.

title: Trussardi Riflesso Blue Vibe Man Eau De Toilette 50ml
description: Trussardi Riflesso Blue Vibe Man Eau De Toilette 50ml represents an introspective journey into the male psyche that is full of duality and seductive undertones. Creativity becomes both the weapon and safe shelter of the contemporary man with a free spirit who knows how to bend to the discipline of everyday life. It is a fragrance that is distinguished by the contrasts of warm and cool, rational and emotional, elegant and subversive, sweet and sharp. Notes of rum, davana and yuzu are lost to the main body of geranium and hazelnut, which then merge within the enchanted world of artemisia and contrast with the wooden accords. The work of designer Carlo Colombo, the dark blue bottle features a satiny finish and is covered in groves. Lime green lettering stands out, framed in the centre, with the raised Trussardi brand name.

title: Trussardi Riflesso Man Eau De Toilette 50ml
description: Trussardi Riflesso Man Eau De Toilette 50ml represents the man who never rests on his laurels and transforms movement and speed into positive energy. It tells the story of the life of a man who doesn’t consider sport to be a competition, but an expression of self-confidence and natural elegance contained within the notes of geranium and violet leaves. Traditional hints of Italian leather, vetiver and Tonka bean intermingle with the awareness and precision of the modern man. The bottle designed by Carlo Colombo, in collaboration with Gaia Trussardi, combines iconic lines with an ergonomic volume, creating an elaborate structure that catches the light beautifully

title: Trussardi Scent Of Gold Woman Eau De Parfum 100ml
description: Trussardi Scent Of Gold Woman Eau De Parfum 100ml

title: Trussardi Sound Of Donna Woman Eau De Parfum
description: Trussardi Sound Of Donna Woman Eau De Parfum is both elegant and non-conformist and sure to leave its mark. The singer Annalisa is the perfect testimonial, representing young, multi-tasking women who love their work as much as leisure, music, life and all its special occasions. The olfactory structure of Sound of Donna created by Emilie Coppermann contains many surprises, such as the contrast between the mandarin, magnolia, green almond, tuberose, heliotrope and the Mont Blanc accord.

title: Trussardi Trussardi Woman Eau De Parfum
description: Trussardi Trussardi Woman Eau De Parfum is the new women's fragrance that has been created exclusively for us by Julie Massé and Violaine Collas, who have evoked an entirely Italian olfactory pyramid through a series of quintessential ingredients. The top notes hit us with the freshness of mandarin intermingled with the bold scent of neroli, to melt into notes of lavender, jasmine and white dahlia. The free, contemporary femininity of this new Trussardi women's scent is enhanced by the hypnotic and velvety base notes of a violet, patchouli and suede accord. The perfectly cylindrical bottle is decorated by glossy painted stripes in matte pink, black and white, with a golden metal lid, and is set to become a real piece of Italian design.

title: Trussardi Uomo The Red Man Eau De Toilette
description: Trussardi Uomo The Red Man Eau De Toilette is the scent of the intriguing man with a finesse and mastery for passion – in all its forms. This fragrance has been created to be persistent and leave its mark thanks to the woody, floral and spicy bouquet. All the audacity innate to Italian elegance is contained within the top notes of zesty lemon, nutmeg, galbanum and cognac, which give life to a sensual and insouciant blend when part of a man’s fragrance. The intense aroma of the middle notes of geranium, violet leaves and clary sage have the same genetic fingerprint of Trussardi’s original scents, which were the basis for everything that would come after.
