No 8 by VALERIE is graceful, sophisticated and feminine ,top notes of delicate orange flower, fresh citrus, and blackcurrant overlay a heart of white floral, black pepper and coffee, with sweet and sensual base notes of cedar, patchouli and van.

title: WaterWipes Wet Wipes 60 Pieces
description: WaterWipes Wet Wipes 60 Pieces a baby’s skin is much more delicate than your own. So it should be cleaned with only the gentlest and purest elements possible. WaterWipes are the only wipes made with just two ingredients; water, specially purified and softened, and a tiny drop of grapefruit seed extract. WaterWipes have been carefully designed to be gentle on babies’ sensitive skin. They are the only wipes that contain absolutely no chemicals, just 99.9% water and 0.1% grapefruit seed extract – a natural skin conditioner. Because they are hypoallergenic, WaterWipes don’t irritate the skin, instead they may help prevent the causes of diaper rash and other skin conditions. The National Eczema Association has awarded the Seal of Acceptance™ to WaterWipes. Because of this, 97% of Health Care Professionals believe that WaterWipes are suitable to be used on the skin of newborn babies.

title: Topface Concealer & Corrector Palette 02
description: Topface Concealer & Corrector Palette 02 i t has a creamy texture and brings a strong hydrating effect of vitamin E to moisturize your makeup that disperses all over your skin and keeps your skin flawless and lasts a long time.

title: Topface Focus Point Concealer Pen 01
description: Topface Focus Point Concealer Pen 01 t his pencil is designed to look natural on your skin rather than cakey. The texture glides on comfortably and blends easily onto your skin with a few pats of your finger. Use it on bare skin as your all-in-one skin perfector or layer it over with our Topface foundation for added coverage where you need it.

title: The NewLab Aha 10% + Bha 2% Face Peeling 30ml

Thanks to AHA - BHA and Rose Water, it helps to reduce the appearance of pores and balance sebum secretion. Provides a light exfoliating sensation. It also acts to protect the skin against signs of aging by renewing it.

The combination of Niacinamide with zinc to balance excessively oily and acne-prone skin. and The pore-tightening effect. Deeply cleansed skin prevents blackheads, balances oil, and shrinks pores.

title: The NewLab Salicylic Acid 0.5% + Niacinamide + Botanical  Extracts Cleansing Gel 200ml
description: The NewLab Salicylic Acid 0.5% + Niacinamide + Botanical Extracts C leansing Gel 200ml this cleansing gel improved mild formula, botanical ingredients, and salicylic acid (BHA) perfectly remove oil and blackheads and moisturize the skin. title: The NewLab 4C Cica + 4D Hyaluronic Acid NMF Intense Hydraplus Recovery Cica Cream 50ml

title: The NewLab Hyaluronic Acid 2% + Vit B5 Face Serum 30ml
description: The NewLab Hyaluronic Acid 2% + Vit B5 Face Serum 30ml deeply Hydrating Formula Face Serum. formulated with long and short-chain hyaluronic acid molecules to penetrate the different layers of skin. It provides i nstant plumping and hydration while protecting you against lifestyle and environmental effects in the long term.

title: The NewLab Caffeine 5% + Green Tea Eye Contour Serum 30ml
description: The NewLab Caffeine 5% + Green Tea Eye Contour Serum 30ml specially formulated for sensitive eye contours and is powered by caffeine. It revitalizes the skin with the antioxidant effect of green tea extract.

title: The NewLab Niacinamide 5% + Alpha Arbutin 2% Face Serum 30ml
description: The NewLab Niacinamide 5% + Alpha Arbutin 2% Face Serum 30ml dark Spot Corrector Formula Face Serum. Brightening face serum for blemished skin combats, redness, age spots, or acne spots. It provides a bright and radiant skin appearance with It's repairing care power against dark spots.

title: The NewLab Niacinamide 10% + Zinc 1% Face Serum 30ml
description: The NewLab Niacinamide 10% + Zinc 1% Face Serum 30ml the anti-acne pore-firming face serum with Niacinamide and zinc protects the skin from environmental factors and also helps the skin produce collagen and hyaluronic acid. ideal for balancing excessively oily and acne-prone skin. Its pore-tightening effect also comes from the power of this duo.

title: The NewLab Vitamin C 10% Face Serum 30ml
description: The NewLab Vitamin C 10% Face Serum 30ml this serum with 10% vitamin C is made for brighter, firmer, and overall better-looking skin. Antioxidant-activated vitamin C protects the skin from UV damage and prevents dark spots that reveal radiant, glowing skin.The easiest way to incorporate this powerful ingredient into your skincare routine is with a serum. A few drops applied in the morning before moisturizer will protect the skin all day long.

title: Bioderma Cicabio Creme Soothing Repairing Cream 100ml

Thanks to copper sulfate and to a grape seed extract, Cicabio Cream helps to maintain the skin in its optimal environment. it helps to decrease sensation of discomfort. It is suitable for the whole family.

title: Bioderma Pigmentbio Foaming Cream 200ml
description: Bioderma Pigmentbio Foaming Cream 200ml gently cleanses the skin, Eliminates colour irregularities and surface impurities to restore the complexion’s radiance, Promotes the disappearance of hyperpigmentation spots and marks while keeping them from reappearing, Leaves the skin comfortable. Very good tolerance - Creamy foam texture - Soap free - Can be used as a mask.

title: Note Conceal And Protect Concealer
description: Note Conceal And Protect Concealer an ultra creamy-concealer to cover and correct all types of blemishes and discoloration for long-lasting flawless complexion. Formulated with Pentavitin, a skin care ingredient that delivers instant and long-lasting hydration and smooths skin. Available in shades for different skin tones and undertones.

title: Note Stay Fresh Fixing Spray 100ml
description: Note Stay Fresh Fixing Spray is a water-based make-up fixing spray. While it provides a lively, fresh look with its moist finish, it increases the permanence of your make-up. It provides mineral support to your skin with its formula containing magnesium, manganese, iron, zinc and calcium. The oil softens the skin with its non-sticky structure.

title: Note Flawless Matte Foundation
description: Note Flawless Matte Foundation long lasting matte effect and a flawless, shine-free complexion. With SPF 15 protection. Breathable formula. Controls shine, ensures a comfortable application leaving skin feeling smooth and velvety. Ideal for combination prone to oily skin.

title: Note Flawless Blusher
description: Note Flawless Blusher soft, silky powder blush that enhances ten complexion with a touch of color and delicate, natural radiance. Infused with special coated pigments super-smooth, ultra-fine texture.

title: Note Bb Cream Anti - Blemish
description: Note Bb Cream Anti - Blemish is specially developed for oily and acne-prone skin. It not only evens out skin tone with breathable coverage, but it also helps to control oiliness thanks to the active ingredient Hygeaphos® A.S. for acne-prone skin, which ensures up to 81% reduction of oiliness with regular use. Your skin is left shine-free with a velvety matte finish. It also contains Carotolino™, a unique blend of carrot root extract, carrot seed oil, and β-carotene, that is proven to effectively shield against blue light, reducing its effects on the skin. SPF 15 for added UVA/UVB protection. Based on a 28-day Clinical Efficacy Test.

title: Note Loose Powder
description: Note Loose Powder an ultra-lightweight, perfecting face powder to set makeup for a long-lasting matte ﬁnish. Formulated with special polymers and oil control ingredients to smooth the skin for an even complexion. Our Loose Powder applies evenly, spreads and blends effortlessly with your make-up. Its ﬁnely-milled texture becomes one with your skin without forming dry patches, and helps to reduce & regulate shine throughout the day, for a more polished look.

title: Beesline Lip Care Honey & Milk
description: Beesline Lip Care Honey & Milk is the ultimate cure for dry, chapped lips! Soothes, moisturises & regenerates the lips sensitive skin through nature’s healing beeswax & precious oils while protecting from external irritants.

title: Beesline Lip Care Shea Butter & Avocado Oil
description: Beesline Lip Care Shea Butter & Avocado Oil is the ultimate cure for dry, chapped lips! Soothes, moisturises & regenerates the lips sensitive skin through nature’s healing beeswax & precious oils while protecting from external irritants.

title: Beesline Lip Care Shimmery Strawberry
description: Beesline Lip Care Shimmery Strawberry is the ultimate cure for dry, chapped lips! Soothes, moisturises & regenerates the lips sensitive skin through nature’s healing beeswax & precious oils while protecting from external irritants.

title: Mustela Cradle Cap Cream 40ml
description: Mustela Cradle Cap Cream 40ml formulated with avocado extract is to be applied directly on baby's and infant's scalp. It helps eliminate cradle cap and reduces the reappearance of patches by limiting excess sebum. Its light, moisturizing texture is easy to apply. This cream contains 95% of natural origin ingredients.

title: Chloe Signature Lumineuse Woman Eau De Parfum
description: Chloe Signature Lumineuse Woman Eau De Parfum created a warm, delicate rose with a sensual spirit that is both feminine and elegant. The 100% natural-origin Eau de Parfum mingles this full and complex rose with the velvety accents of Sambac jasmine. Vanilla exalts the floral heart, while balmy amber tones lend a generous, addictive roundness. The fragrance is enclosed in a pleated glass bottle anchored in the Maison’s DNA. For the first time, it echoes the Maison’s distinctive stitching in the delicate pink thread that trims the beige ribbon tied at the bottle’s neck.

title: Clarins  After Sun Gel Ultra Soothing 150ml
description: Clarins After Sun Gel Ultra Soothing 150ml protect your skin against signs of premature wrinkles and skin ageing with after sun care – the second key step in sun protection. This refreshing gel immediately soothes and comforts, as it helps reduce after sun redness and calms that feeling of hot skin after too much time in the sun. Skin is rehydrated, keeping it soft and smooth, helping reduce the appearance of fine lines and peeling, while helping to prolong your tan.

title: Clarins After Sun Replenishing Moisture Care
description: Clarins After Sun Replenishing Moisture Care this after sun soothes and replenishes the skin after sun exposure thanks to Centella Asiatica combined with an extract of Mimosa Tenuiflora. Redness and peeling are visibly reduced and the skin feels soft to touch and comfortable.

title: Svr Topialyse Ultra-melting Cream 200ml
description: Svr Topialyse Ultra-melting Cream 200ml is specially developed to treat and comfort very dry and irritated skin that struggles with atopic dermatitis. Suitable for the whole family, this unique formula promises to not only offer deep nourishment but also boost the skin's ability to self-repair. On one side, the presence of Prebiotic Sugar is able to restore the microbiome and also stimulate the skin’s natural immune defenses. Furthermore, while Niacinamide offers soothing and anti-inflammatory benefits, Omegas 3, 6, and 9 focus on nourishing the skin. As a result, the SVR Topialyse Cream Anti-Dryness Nourishing Care ensures comfort and softness. In fact, after each application, you will enjoy supple and velvety skin that also displays more health and strength

title: Clarins Eau Ressourcante Shower Milk 200ml
description: Clarins Eau Ressourcante Shower Milk 200ml comes in a soft, smooth shower cream to cleanse the skin in the bath or shower. Find some serenity with this skincare that combines the soothing scent of Eau Ressourçante essential oils with nourishing organic sweet almond oil. Its creamy texture gently cleanses and nourishes the skin, while leaving it delicately scented. 92% natural ingredients.

title: Clarins Extra Firming Emulsion 75ml
description: Clarins Extra Firming Emulsion 75ml skin gets the spring power the Extra-Firming range promises and optimum hydration but with a lighter delivery system. Because of its water base, it seeps easily into the deeper layers of the epidermis, offering all skin types and especially oil-prone complexions or women living in warmer climates, a firming formula that’s just as effective but lots more lightweight. It’s powered by kangaroo flower and mitracarpus extracts to help visibly plump skin, reduce the look of wrinkles and leave skin visibly firmer. Dry skin types can use our Emulsion in combination with Extra-Firming Cream to optimize firming results. It features the same addictive camellia and rose-scented that the Extra-Firming is loved for.

title: Clarins Lip Comfort Oil
description: Clarins Lip Comfort Oil is a unique fusion formula rich in plant-based active ingredients and directly inspired by Clarins' expert face and body oils. • Nutrition and comfort. • Leaves a shiny, non-sticky finish on the lips with a subtle sweet taste. • A sponge-tip applicator that makes application simple.

title: Bioderma Atoderm Hands And Nails Cream 50ml
description: Bioderma Atoderm Hands And Nails Cream 50ml is the ideal cream to keep the skin of your hands both nourished and protected. Often exposed to external aggressions both hands and nails can be weakened by our everyday gestures. Stripped of lipids, the skin of our hands can become fragile and drier and more susceptible to cracking. With a nourishing and repairing formula, this cream helps restore the skin barrier, providing an immediate feeling of comfort. Regenerating and instantly soothing, it lays a protective shield over the skin, keeping it protected from environmental sources of irritation. It also contributes to condition the nails making them stronger day after day. With a pleasant creamy texture, that is quickly absorbed, this daily cream calms, nourishes, and repairs the skin protecting both hands and nails from daily aggressions.

title: Elie Saab Le Parfum Bridal Woman Eau De Parfum
description: Elie Saab Le Parfum Bridal Woman Eau De Parfum as delicate as lace edging on a bridal gown, ELIE SAAB Le Parfum Bridal EDP is a floral woody musky fragrance that inspires and brings your most precious moments to life. Inspired by a floral wedding bouquet, this captivating fragrance induces a petal-filled contrast with Ylang-ylang and Orange blossom notes. The iconic Le Parfum bottle is adorned with a warm and sensual beige hue and airy lace that evokes the softness and delicacy of a bridal veil. Enhanced by a hint of pink, this luminous beige evokes both the silky fabrics of a wedding gown, the amber light of a sunbeam, and the shimmer of embroidery, revealing the sensuality of the skin. A floral lace motif delicately decorates the crystalline facets of the bottle.

title: Bioderma Cicabio Arnica+ Cream 40ml
description: Bioderma Cicabio Arnica+ Cream 40ml quickly reduces feelings of discomfort and irritation in case of bruises, bumps and knocks. With Arnica and the exclusive patent Antalgicine™, it not only has anti-inflammatory properties that assist the body's natural healing process but also helps prevent, minimize, and soothe feelings of discomfort and irritation. Calming and enhancing skin recovery this cream is not only indicated to help with bruises, bumps and knocks but can also be used with a preventive action in case of dermatological interventions and injectable treatments in order to prevent bruising. With an easy to apply and quickly absorbed texture, it is suitable for the whole family, and perfect to have on our first aid kit.

title: Kate Spade Kate Spade Cherie Woman Eau De Parfum 100ml
description: Kate Spade Kate Spade Cherie Woman Eau De Parfum 100ml i ntroducing Cherie, our new fragrance inspired by the spirit of enchanting adventure. Meaning "sweetheart" or "dearest" in French, Cherie combines the joyful energy of New York with the timeless romance of Paris. Opening with fruity top notes of redcurrant and raspberry, the scent centers around a floral blend of sweet pea and jasmine sambac. Anchored by base notes of sensual white woods and Ambrofix, Cherie leaves you with an intimate trail of warmth and optimism thanks to a dose of comforting musks.

title: Bioderma Photoderm Max Tinted Fluide Spf 100 - Light
description: Bioderma Photoderm Max Tinted Fluide Spf 100 - Light o ffers an optimum UVA/UVB protection Activates the skin's natural defences and protects from risks of cellular damage Made for skin subjected to maximum sun intensity (moutains, tropics...) Smooth fluid texture, Light Tinted, no greasy effect, no white traces Very good tolerance - Non-comedogenic - Unfragranced - Water resistant.

title: Bioderma Photoderm Crème Moisturizing Tinted Cream SPF50+ - Light
description: Bioderma Photoderm Crème Moisturizing Tinted Cream SPF50+ - Light has high photoprotection against UV rays, perfect for normal, even sensitive skin . Namely, in addition to high protection against sun rays, this sunscreen also provides a boost of hydration to the skin. Specifically, this makes it perfect so that the skin does not dry out during sun exposure, always keeping its hydration levels balanced and healthy. Moreover, any feeling of discomfort is prevented as the skin becomes softer, smoother, and more comfortable. In addition to all this, this sunscreen also has color pigments that end up evening out the entire complexion, leaving it very luminous and radiant for a long time. As a plus, it is non-comedogenic, non-sticky and non-greasy, and is also highly resistant to water, heat and high humidity.

title: Bioderma Photoderm Tinted Aquafluide SPF50+ - Light
description: Bioderma Photoderm Tinted Aquafluide SPF50+ - Light is a mattifying sunscreen perfect for normal to oily skin. Specifically, this cream has an ultra-fluid texture with high UVA and UVB protection while evening out the skin tone. In this sense, by having color pigments, the entire complexion gains a more unfirm tone while remaining protected throughout the day. In addition, this facial sunscreen guarantees hydration for up to 8 hours, keeping the skin with a dry feel and balanced.

title: Lancome Clarifique Pro Solution Serum 50ml
description: Lancome Clarifique Pro Solution Serum 50ml Brightening serum that visibly reduces dark spots and post-acne marks and tightens the look of pores. Formulated with 10% PHA (polyhydroxy acid), niacinamide, and beech bud extract, Clarifique Pro-Solution is a concentrated brightening treatment that delivers powerful results over time without being harsh on skin. Women see brighter skin in one week and visibly tighter pores in four weeks. In eight weeks, dark spots and post-acne mark skin discoloration are visibly reduced. From light to melanin-rich skin tones, 9 out of 10 women saw a visible transformation in their skin after using one bottle of Clarifique Pro-Solution – including those with sensitive skin or acne-prone skin

title: Lancome Idole Now Woman Eau De Parfum
description: Lancome Idole Now Woman Eau De Parfum a unique florality inspired by nature, augmented by science. A rich, bold new fragrance, Idôle Now merges high quality natural ingredients with science. At the heart of this new fragrance lies a powerful trio of iconic ingredients inspired by nature and augmented by science. Formulated with upcycled rose, safely extracted Malaysian orchid accord, and sustainably sourced vanilla infused with repurposed biotech vanillin, Idôle Now inspires the future of bold yet sustainable perfumery.

title: Acm Novophane Energizing Shampoo 200ml
description: Acm Novophane Energizing Shampoo 200ml the ideal complement for anti-hair loss care products an energy bath, genuine source of beauty and vigour, intended for thin, fragile and lank hair. Thanks to its combination of 6 vitamins with hair and scalp stimulating and fortifying properties, the NOVOPHANE energizing shampoo gently cleanses and stimulates fragile hair and scalp. It restores the hair's volume, strength and vigour and can be used as often as required. Gentle and vitamin-rich, it is highly effective in support of an anti-hair loss treatment or in rotation with care shampoos, such as one of our anti-dandruff shampoos. It rinses our easily and facilitates conditioning and styling.

title: Uriage Bariéderm Repairing Cica-cream With Cu-zn 40ml
description: Uriage Bariéderm Repairing Cica-cream With Cu-zn 40ml is a repairing and insulating cream especially designed to care for damaged and irritated skin. Formulated with Copper and Zinc, which purity the skin and minimize irritation, and Uriage Thermal Water, which relieves sensations of discomfort, this product may be used on a variety of small skin lesions, such as scratches, insect bites, or post-shaving irritation. The fluid texture is easily applied and easily absorbed, for an instant feeling of comfort.

title: Lancome Monsieur Big Eyeliner
description: Lancome Monsieur Big Eyeliner a big, bold line in one stroke. ,,This marker-like eyeliner effortlessly glides across the lashline to create a bold look in a flash. , This waterproof, quick-dry liner stays put until you say when: up to 24H wear, yet easy to remove.,Its jet-black pigments allows an ultra intense vinyl finish.

title: Narciso Rodriguez Narciso Rodriguez All Of Me Woman Eau De Parfum
description: Narciso Rodriguez Narciso Rodriguez All Of Me Woman Eau De Parfum a celebration of individuality and self-expression, all of me eau de parfum reinvents floral fragrance by fusing precious rose centifolia with bold geranium bourbon, a note usually found in men's fragrances. This distinctive duet of rose and geranium is combined with essence of white peony, powdery black iris and bewitching tuberose to form a faceted blend of florals that unfurls to a heart of delicate pure white muscs. The heart of musc is reveinted with six different musc notes blend together to create an addictive, second-skin quality, each one bringing a distinct dimension to the scent and expressing a different facet of the wearer. In the base of the fragrance, warm sandalwood and velvety amber notes create a rich, enveloping trail that lingers on the skin.

title: Essence Lash Without Limits Extreme Lengthening & Volume Mascara
description: Essence Lash Without Limits Extreme Lengthening & Volume Mascara the innovative and flexible elastomer brush of essence lash WITHOUT LIMITS EXTREME LENGTHENING & VOLUME MASCARA reaches even the shortest lashes for ultra-extended and voluminous lashes! It's also been ophthalmologically tested and is suitable for contact lens wearers.

title: Essence I Love Flaw Less Skin Foundation Matte + Full Coverage 30ml
description: Essence I Love Flaw Less Skin Foundation Matte + Full Coverage 30ml it's creates a natural, matte finish. Without clogging the pores, the formulation stays on longer and also protects the skin with SPF 20.

title: Ralph Lauren Polo Oud Man Eau De Parfum 125ml
description: Ralph Lauren Polo Oud Man Eau De Parfum 125ml Created to make an unforgettable statement, Polo Oud combines the depth and richness of Rose with the freshness of Orange Flower to reveal this precious Oud with elegant nuance and texture. Experience the sensual, exotic intensity of Polo Oud

title: Essence Dip Eyeliner Waterproof 24h Long-lasting
description: Essence Dip Eyeliner Waterproof 24h Long-lasting is a liquid eyeliner that makes it very easy to create your perfect eyeliner look! The great thing about this liner is not only the thin tip, but also that it is waterproof.

title: Essence Tinted Kiss Hydrating Lip Tint 4ml
description: Essence Tinted Kiss Hydrating Lip Tint 4ml gives the lips a hint of colour with a long-lasting, natural-looking finish. The weightless texture with a light coverage provides moisture and feels pleasantly light on the lips.

title: Rochas Byzance Gold Woman Eau De Parfum
description: Rochas Byzance Gold Woman Eau De Parfum like the magical glow of a star-studded night sky, Byzance Gold signals a world of wonder, like a modern fairy tale where dreams mingle with reality.

title: Trussardi Donna Levriero Intense Collection Eau De Parfum 100ml
description: Trussardi Donna Levriero Intense Collection Eau De Parfum 100ml is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Trussardi Donna Eau de Parfum Intense was launched in 2019. The nose behind this fragrance is Nathalie Lorson. Top notes are yuzu, citron and water fruit; middle notes are orange blossom, jasmine tea and water lily; base notes are patchouli, cedar, sandalwood and vanilla.

title: Essence Extreme Shine Volume Lipgloss 102 Sweet Dreams
description: Essence Extreme Shine Volume Lipgloss 102 Sweet Dreams is the must-have for gorgeous lips – without the addition of silicones, microplastic particles, alcohol and oil. And that's not all: the range offers three different benefits for versatile lip make-up – maximum volume, an extreme plumping effect and a radiant glow. The extreme shine volume lipglosses are available in a wide range of colours so there’s sure to be a perfect lip booster for every make-up style.

title: Trussardi Le Vie Di Milano Alba Sui Navigli Collection Eau De Parfum 100ml
description: Trussardi Le Vie Di Milano Alba Sui Navigli Collection Eau De Parfum 100ml unisex scent springs forth with notes of precious oils: bitter orange, lime and basil. The middle notes enclose a zesty spritz accord, which is warmed up by the juniper oil and taken to new heights by the Petitgrain Bigarade. The finish regales you with the richness of Ambroxan, vetiver oil and Succan absolute, which is tempered by musk.

title: Trussardi Le Vie Di Milano Aperitivo Milanese Porta Nuova Collection Eau De Parfum 100ml
description: Trussardi Le Vie Di Milano Aperitivo Milanese Porta Nuova Collection Eau De Parfum 100ml i conic, unisex fragrances distinguish the new Trussardi scents: a journey that begins far away to relive the unique atmosphere of the streets of Milan. The notes of mandarin leaves, Italian neroli and Calabrian bergamot open the bouquet of Aperitivo Milanese Porta Nuova. The middle notes are occupied by the depth of heliotrope, with amaretto and iris, which mix with the sweet base notes of vanilla, benzoin and amber. The satin glass bottle comes in a distinctive shade of grey with a sculptural golden metal cap that accurately reproduces a miniature version of the head of the Italian Levriero, the Trussardi greyhound.

title: Trussardi Le Vie Di Milano Behind The Curtain Piazza Alla Scala Collection Eau De Parfum 100ml
description: Trussardi Le Vie Di Milano Behind The Curtain Piazza Alla Scala Collection Eau De Parfum 100ml i conic, unisex fragrances distinguish the new Trussardi scents: a journey that begins far away to relive the unique atmosphere of the streets of Milan. A prelude of bergamot, saffron and cloves opens the olfactory score of Behind the Curtain Piazza della Scala. The middle notes of juniper and jasmine, beautifully blended with hints of labdanum and leather, fade into a deep vortex of sandalwood and patchouli. The satin glass bottle comes in petroleum green hues with a sculptural golden metal cap that accurately reproduces a miniature version of the head of the Italian Levriero, the Trussardi greyhound.

title: Trussardi Le Vie Di Milano Italian Artists In Via Solferino Collection Eau De Parfum 100ml
description: Trussardi Le Vie Di Milano Italian Artists In Via Solferino Collection Eau De Parfum 100ml the unisex Via Solferino scent opens with a mineral accord that paves the way for the freshness of the maté and yuzu citrus. The heart reveals an unexpected symphony of floral notes, with peony, magnolia and osmanthus, on a base of red ginger. The base notes combine delicate heliotrope with sensual patchouli, accentuated by suede accords.

title: Trussardi Le Vie Di Milano Walking In Porta Venezia Collection Eau De Parfum 100ml
description: Trussardi Le Vie Di Milano Walking In Porta Venezia Collection Eau De Parfum 100ml the unisex Porta Venezia scent reveals head notes of aromatic star anise, enhanced by lemon oil, black pepper and the floral Belanis. The heart contains fine artemisia, wormwood and Madagascar geranium oils, enveloped in sensual violet leaves. The grand finale is created by woody hints of patchouli, fir balsam and cedar oil, softened by Madagascar bourbon vanilla.

title: Trussardi Le Vie Di Milano Walking On Via Fiori Oscur Collection Eau De Parfum 100ml
description: Trussardi Le Vie Di Milano Walking On Via Fiori Oscur Collection Eau De Parfum 100ml t he unisex Via Fiori Oscuri scent opens with the citrussy hints of Madagascar mandarin and bergamot, which lead to the floral complexity of Lilybelle. The heart is a crescendo of floral notes with mimosa absolute, magnolia oil, rose and heliotrope. The base notes are both powerful and delicate, with rice powder, tonka bean, bourbon vanilla and Madagascar vetiver.

title: Yves Saint Laurent Couture Mini Clutch
description: Yves Saint Laurent Couture Mini Clutch Introducing Couture Mini Clutch, YSL Beauty’s new couture object of desire that makes a statement before you even open it. Tone-on-tone palettes of four eye-sculpting colours to express your edge with high intensity pigments. Couture-inspired chromatics and luxurious finishes that take your gaze to a new dimension. The two statement palettes are inspired by places close to the designer’s heart. While feeding, the accordion-style nipple flexes as baby moves their head, enabling baby to maintain smooth drinking process, thus decreasing ingestion of air. The anti-colic valve located at the bottom of the bottle allows for breast milk to flow while ensuring air bubbles do not travel through the breast milk. Experts agree that the best transition occurs when bottle flow and mother's flow match. The Stage 1 nipple's flow has been reduced to mimic the flow of the breast. title: Tommee Tippee Roll N Go Bib
description: Tommee Tippee Roll N Go Bib with their clever crumb catcher and easy wipe down surface, Easi-Roll bibs are the perfect bibs to save your baby from messy spills at home or out and about. title: Tommee Tippee Nappy Ghange Caddy
description: Tommee Tippee Nappy Ghange Caddy our changing table organiser can store all the nappy changing accessories in a simple, attractive and space-saving way. From wipes and creams to nappy bags and nappies (up to 50 pieces). Everything can be stored comfortably and easily within reach in a spacious main compartment, three practical side pockets and a top compartment. This changing table organiser is robust, and you can safely store up to 3 kg of changing accessories. Two strong hooks ensure that you can easily attach the organiser to the changing table, and it is extremely easy to clean - simply wipe the surface with a damp cloth. And you're done! Our convenient changing table organiser folds flat when empty, making it easy to store or take with you when travelling. Whether your changing table is in the children's room or in the living room, this organiser looks good and stylish anywhere. This clever changing table organiser attaches to any changing table with two strong hooks, so everything is within reach but out of reach of curious little hands! Fortunately, there are smart nappy changing accessories from Tommee Tippee, so you can keep dirt and bad odours to a minimum and keep your home smelling good. From nappy bins to our nappy odour neutralising spray and space-saving organiser, you will find everything you need for stress-free and odour-free nappy changes. .

title: Skin Doctors Radiance And Renew Night Cream 50ml
description: Skin Doctors Radiance And Renew Night Cream 50ml reawaken tired skin and achieve a more even, glowing complexion with Skin Doctors Radiance & Renew. A one-step, overnight, multi-active skin resurfacing cream that gently and gradually removes the dead, lifeless top layer of skin to reveal younger-looking, glowing skin. Radiance & Renew targets multiple skin concerns to improve the appearance of visible signs of ageing, skin texture, pigmentations, blemishes and blocked pores without harsh scratching of the skin for a clearer complexion. Inspired by professional chemical peels, this beauty treatment combines both alpha and beta hydroxy acids to have a cosmetic resurfacing effect. .

title: Ducray Kertyol Pso Shampoo 200ml
description: Ducray Kertyol Pso Shampoo 200ml has a unique formula that acts on specific elements involved in psoriasis. It is, therefore, the ideal complementary care for psoriatic scalp . With an innovative active ingredient, that has specific anti-inflammatory and soothing actions on elements involved in psoriasis, it helps rapidly improve the appearance of the skin. Due to its ability to slow down the accelerated cell renewal, typical of psoriasis-prone skin, it quickly limits the appearance of new scaly plaques. In addition, its keratolytic action also helps eliminate visible plaques on the scalp. It rapidly calms both itching and redness, thanks to its anti-inflammatory and soothing properties, and is suitable to use in combination with medicinal treatments or as a follow-up, normalizing flaking and also helping prevent recurrences. For rough and very dry scalp.

title: Omron M4 It

title: Omron A3 Complete Nebulizer
description: Omron A3 Complete Nebulizer can allow the medication start acting faster than taking pills or injections. For an inhaled medication to be most effective it should be targeted directly to the area that needs to be treated. To reach different target areas of the airway tract (for example upper and lower airways) a different droplet size of the medication is needed. By changing the nebulization position between 1 to 3, the particle size of the aerosol will change, so that the medication can be targeted towards the different parts of the airways.

title: Omron Micro Air 100 Nebulizer
description: Omron Micro Air 100 Nebulizer is a small, portable nebulizer that enables patients to take their medication wherever and whenever they need it. The unique mesh technology makes it more comfortable to use than traditional nebulizers. The silent operation enables discreet usage without disturbing others. The unique design of the MicroAIR U100 allows the patient to use it in any position. Even while lying down, making it more comfortable for smaller children. MicroAIR U100 is designed to treat respiratory conditions of the lower airways, like bronchitis, bronchiolitis, COPD and asthma.

title: Omron Gentle Temp 720

title: Omron E3 Intense Pain Reliver

Choose one of the pre-programmed zones: back, shoulders, joints, arms, legs, sole or feet and adjust the intensity level which suits you the best.

The lid doubles up as a space-saving sterile surface which can be flipped over and used for bottle assembly. This baby bottle steriliser is chemical-free and sterilises your bottles and baby feeding accessories using 100% natural steam and therefore leaves no nasty residue. Simply pour 200mls of water into the base, place baby bottles and other feeding accessories into the tray, replace the lid securely and pop in the microwave. Steam gets into all those hard-to-reach places, so you can be reassured that it sterilises every surface, killing 99.9% of germs and harmful bacteria which may linger in bottles, teats, breast pumps and other accessories even after thorough washing. †Tested against Coronavirus and Influenza H1N1 (tested to EN 16777) When the sterilising cycle is finished, either remove contents and use immediately or leave the lid closed and contents will remain sterile for up to 24 hours.

title: Mugler Alien Goddess Supra Florale Woman Eau De Parfum

In this case, whenever we are exposed to the sun, there is an accumulation of damage on the skin’s surface and deep down at cellular level. From 3 months: this toy is ideal for babies because it develops tactile sensitivity and has a leaf-shaped teether, made of soft plastic, that the baby can bite during the teething period. Washable: it can be put in the washing machine to keep the toy clean.

title: Chicco Rainbow Spinner
description: Chicco Rainbow Spinner this delightful Chicco toy is sure to bring joy to any baby or toddler. The Rainbow Spinner features bright colors and a fun spinning motion that will capture their attention and engage their senses. Made by the trusted brand Chicco, you can trust that this toy is built to last and provide hours of fun. Perfect for little ones who are developing their motor skills, this developmental toy is a great addition to any playroom. The colorful design and spinning motion will encourage them to reach, grab, and explore. With its sturdy construction and engaging design, the Chicco Toy Rainbow Spinner is a must-have for any parent or caregiver looking to provide a fun and stimulating play experience.

title: Chicco Aquarium Spinner
description: Chicco Aquarium Spinner the electronic spinning top inspired by the wonders of the sea with colorful fish spinning quickly on a mirrored surface. With light effects and fun music. Helps children understand cause-and-effect relationships and develops hand-eye coordination skills.

title: Chicco Weaning Bib 6m+ 2pcs Neutral Color
description: Chicco Weaning Bib 6m+ 2pcs Neutral Color is designed for eating without getting dirty. Soft fabric: these bibs are made of soft cotton and are ideal for preventing stains and absorbing liquids. Waterproof back: the back of each bib included in the package is completely waterproof, to prevent food and liquids from staining clothes. 2 pieces: the package includes 2 bibs so you can always have a bib ready for your baby.

title: Chicco Kids Cup 2Years+ 350ml
description: Chicco Kids Cup 2Years+ 350ml is the ideal travel mug to keep little ones hydrated on the go. Drinking a drink with Travel Cup is as easy as drinking from the bottle. Thanks to the practical opening, simply open the lid and enjoy your drink from the integrated pourer. The airtight seal prevents leakage of liquids when the lid is closed. The Travel Cup from Chicco is also ideal for on the go thanks to the practical, integrated folding handle. Available in 3 colours: pink, light blue and green.

title: Chicco Kids Pop-up Cup 2y+ 350ml
description: Chicco Kids Pop-up Cup 2y+ 350ml is specially designed for kids aged 2 years and older, making hydration easy for toddlers who are always on the move. It features a soft silicone spout with a protective cover just flip it and sip! Ensures safe and hygienic drinking, with no need to touch the spout. Integrated spill-proof system lets your child drink comfortably without spills or mess. Equipped with a wide, ergonomic handle for easy carrying wherever you go. Easy to disassemble and clean, making it perfect for everyday use.

title: Garnier 8hr Acne Strip Invisible Hydrocolloid 22 Patches
description: Garnier 8hr Acne Strip Invisible Hydrocolloid 22 Patches provide a fast and effective solution for your bad skin days! The hydrocolloid patch forms a protective seal over spots absorbing oil and impurities to flatten and reduce the appearance of spots in 8H. Ultra-thin and invisible on all skin tones, the barely there patches are translucent with ultra-thin edges providing seamless coverage day and night - even under makeup! By creating a shield over your spots, the patches prevent picking creating a protective environment for your blemish. Dermatologically tested & suitable for all skin types.

title: Garnier Super UV Invisible Air Mist Sunscreen SPF50 75ml
description: Garnier Super UV Invisible Air Mist Sunscreen SPF50 75ml is a sunscreen mist that can be sprayed even over makeup. Light as air, the Garnier sunscreen mist gives you broad-spectrum protection against sun damage. The sunscreen mist with SPF 50+ fights UV-B rays and prevents sun burns, while PA++++ formula shields your skin from UV-A rays to help prevent signs of aging. With its unique Air-LockTM technology, the SPF 50+ sunscreen locks in UV filters without leaving a white cast. Now apply and reapply sunscreen every day, with no stickiness, and give your skin 99%* sun-damage protection. Infused with vitamin C, a powerful antioxidant, the sunscreen mist blocks the formation of sunspots and dark spots. Get the benefits of a powerful sunscreen in a lightweight, no white cast, hypoallergenic mist. Between workouts or as over-makeup SPF, never step out without your Garnier sunscreen mist and give your skin SPF. EVERY. DAY.

title: Cerave Oil Control Moisturising Gel-Cream 52ml
description: Cerave Oil Control Moisturising Gel-Cream 52ml is a daily lightweight moisturising gel-cream with Oil Absorbing Technology, Hyaluronic Acid & 3 Essential Ceramides, helps absorb excess oil for all day hydration & shine control, while helping to protect the skin’s natural barrier. It is formulated to help absorb excess oil for all day hydration and shine control. Developed with dermatologists, this gel-cream leaves skin looking healthy and less oily for up to 8 hours, while protecting the skin’s natural barrier. Enriched with Oil-Absorbing Technology, Hyaluronic Acid & 3 Essential Ceramides. Suitable for use under makeup without piling. Also suitable for sensitive skin or people who may be prone to acne.

title: Skala Expert Glicólico 3 En 1 Cream 1000g
description: Skala Expert Glicólico 3 En 1 Cream 1000g is a deep treatment, a highly effective conditioner, and a styling cream in one package! With a 100% vegan formula free of animal ingredients, it contains a 6% glycolic complex that significantly enhances hair strength and shine. It offers an innovative solution for damaged and dull hair, revitalizing the health of the strands from the root. Its formula combines a high hydration power of glycolic acid with active ingredients that together provide: Intense revitalization; Restores hair health, replenishing essential nutrients for strong, hydrated hair with incredible shine. Greater resistance: Makes the strands more resistant to external damage. Radiant shine and softness: Restores spectacular shine and softness to the touch, leaving hair super silky. Natural movement: Improves hair malleability, facilitating detangling and overall texture. Perfect for you looking for healthy, shiny, frizz-free hair.

title: Carroten After-Sun Cooling Gel with Bio Aloe Vera 200ml
description: Carroten After-Sun Cooling Gel with Bio Aloe Vera 200ml the After Sun Cooling Gel, with bio Aloe Vera, helps calming the skin and stimulating cell regeneration process, after a long day under the sun.It is enriched with Panthenol, provides deep hydration up to 24h protecting from dryness caused after sun exposure. title: Lionelo Fidi One Electric Breast Pump
description: Lionelo Fidi One Electric Breast Pump is an electric cordless three-phase breast pump offering invaluable support to mothers during breast milk expression. The device has three operational modes: a massage mode to stimulate lactation, a milk expression mode, and a mixed mode simulating how a baby naturally feeds while falling asleep, preparing the mother for a gentle conclusion to the pumping session. There are 9 intensity levels available in each mode to allow for precise adjustment according to individual preferences. For added convenience in daily use, the breast pump automatically saves the last settings to eliminate the need to reconfigure the device when it is switched on again The breast pump comes with a universally sized funnel made of soft silicone. Its practicality stands out. It’s compact, lightweight, and yet equipped with a powerful battery that lasts up to 120 minutes. Thanks to these features, it’s simple to take along on trips or when you’re out and about.

title: Tommee Tippee Quick Cook 6-in-1 Baby Food Maker - White
description: Tommee Tippee Quick Cook 6-in-1 Baby Food Maker - White be an amazing chef for your baby steam and blend home-made baby food in minutes. Suitable for fruit, vegetables, meat and fish. Steam in steamer basket, blend in jug, or combine both for a range of textures from smooth purées to chunky meals. Includes handy spatula stored in the handle. Automatic timer to set steam and blend times. Suitable for all stages of weaning from first tastes to larger meals – 200g max capacity. Safe to use, easy to clean.

title: Lionelo Willow Playpen - Grey Concrete
description: Lionelo Willow Playpen - Grey Concrete is a playpen that will appeal to children and parents alike. It provides ample space for the child to play joyfully and hygienically, giving parents peace of mind. With its tall walls, the playpen keeps even older children protected and comfortable. Mesh in the walls provides improved air circulation, while allowing parents to maintain eye contact with their little one. Four suction cups on the feet ensure stability. The playpen features a reinforced frame, and a soft foam layer along the top edges for added safety and comfort. 2 zippered side openings offer easy access, enabling your toddler to independently enter and exit the playpen. This reduces the burden on the carer’s back, as they no longer need to lift the child over the wall each time. The playpen is made from easy-to-clean materials to maintain a hygienic environment for the child. Effortless folding and a compact size when folded, along with the included carry bag, make for convenient transport and storage. This proves handy not only for organising space at home but also for hassle-free travel. Dimensions: 127 x 187 x 68 cm.

title: Lionelo Floris Cushion - Grey Stone
description: Lionelo Floris Cushion - Grey Stone is a comfortable cushion for Lionelo Floris high chair. Do you want to increase your little one's comfort in the Leonillo Flores Highchair? You can complete the set with a soft seat and backrest cushion that is practical, convenient, and comfortable for your little one who has just started sitting up independently. Thanks to strong Velcro fastenings, the Leonillo Flores cushion securely attaches to the highchair. A slot for the carrying handle maintains mobility. The material is pleasant to the touch and non-irritating, yet breathable, preventing your baby from overheating.

title: Lionelo Car Seat levi One I-Size
description: Lionelo Car Seat levi One I-Size is a car seat made in accordance with the latest R129 approval. It is dedicated to children in the 76-150 cm height range. The model has a headrest reinforced with Memory Foam, which is excellent for absorbing stress. The seat is designed for FWF (forward-facing) installation using the car's seat belts, so it fits any car model. The 10-position headrest adjustment and the wide seat with reduction insert make the seat grow with your child. The backrest can be removed for easy storage.

title: Lionelo Car Seat Bastiaan RWF I-Size
description: Lionelo Car Seat Bastiaan RWF I-Size is a swivel car seat that complies with the latest R129 (i-Size) standard. Its safety is confirmed by independent crash tests, conducted under much more stringent conditions than required by the i-Size standard itself. Its wide height range from 40 to 150 cm makes it a versatile choice that will serve you for years to come. In addition, the seat also features easy and intuitive installation, thanks to the ISOFIX system and Top Tether belt. The 360°EasyTurn function is sure to be appreciated by any parent! In the design of the Bastiaan RWF i-Size car seat, we also used a number of dedicated safety systems, such as the headrest made with Tri-Guard technology. It is built from a combination of 3 different layers of materials, such as EPS polystyrene and Memory Foam, which is characterized by extraordinary resilience, so it is great at absorbing any strain. Meanwhile, the headrest itself wraps around the child's head, ensuring the safety of this most injury-prone part of the body. In addition, the use of advanced side protection protects the child during unforeseen traffic incidents.

title: Svr Sun Secure Blur Optical Mousse Cream 50ml Spf50+ + Free Svr Bag
description: Svr Sun Secure Blur Optical Mousse Cream 50ml Spf50+ + Free Topialyse Cleanser 55ml is a daily sunscreen that not only protects from solar radiation but also helps blur imperfections and unify the complexion. With a powerful combination of ingredients, including a patented combination of 4 photostable sunscreen filters, this sunscreen not only provides very high protection against UVA and UVB rays but also protects from infrared and visible light. Its unique mousse cream texture, with a delicate apricot color, is perfect to blur imperfections and unify the skin tone providing a beautifying action with an invisible finish. All in all, its particular formula leaves the skin moisturized and smoothed, and with a pleasant velvety touch. It works beautifully as a makeup base leaving the skin comfortable and protected. During 21 days of application, 100% of the users noticed a "beautiful skin" action with an invisible finish and 100% of the users noticed smoothed, moisturized and comfortable skin. For all skin types, including sensitive skin.

title: Lionelo Aurora Bedside Crib
description: Lionelo Aurora Bedside Crib the Lionelo Aurora 3-in-1 offers exceptional versatility, serving as a classic cot, a cradle, and a co-sleeper. It is a safe sleeping space for your baby from birth until they are able to sit up by themselves. Lockable castors allow you to easily move the cot around the house, keeping your little one close by, for example when you are in the kitchen. When the castors are locked and turned around, the cot converts into a traditional cradle on runners. The legs can be smoothly adjusted to match the height of the parents’ bed – simply remove the mesh side and use the included mounting straps to transform the Aurora into a co-sleeper. The mesh-lined walls promote excellent air circulation and facilitate visual contact between the child and the parent. Medium-firmness foam mattress (T25 foam) provides optimum support for the child from head to toe. The mattress angle can be adjusted, which is useful when the baby tends to posset or has a runny nose. The entire cover is washable. Dimensions: 85x60x66 cm.

The disposable nozzle, with pre-inserted absorbent filter, ensures maximum hygiene. It i ncludes: 3 disposable anatomical probes, a flexible tube and a suction nozzle. title: Esthederm Age Proteom Advanced Serum 30ml
description: Esthederm Age Proteom Advanced Serum 30ml is an advanced anti-aging serum that effectively fights skin aging. For that purpose, this serum resorts to a powerful and innovative formula that combines two incredible actives. On one hand, it features the renowned Eau Cellulaire patent which is able to mimic the natural water on the skin, having high affinity and efficacy. On the other hand, it contains the new and exclusive Age Proteom technology. To explain, the skin's proteome consists of the proteins essential for the skin, such as elastin and collagen, and such proteins play a role in skin aging. Therefore, by preserving the skin's proteome, this technology fights skin aging. As a result, the skin ages slower. Like so, this serum effectively acts on all signs of aging: wrinkles, dullness, lack of firmness, lack of volume, and uneven skin tone. In other words, it visibly and lastingly reduces the signs of skin aging.

title: Beurer Body Brush - FC 25
description: Beurer Body Brush - FC 25 is designed to provide gentle yet effective body cleansing . It offers deep cleaning and exfoliation for smooth, refreshed skin. With its waterproof IPX7 design, it can be safely used in the shower or bath. The ergonomic long handle makes it easy to reach areas like the back, while two interchangeable brush heads (gentle cleansing and deep exfoliation) adapt to different skin needs. Featuring dual-speed settings, a removable brush head for easy cleaning, and cordless convenience with batteries, this body brush delivers brighter, softer skin with effortless use.

title: Beurer Multigroomer - MN9X
description: Beurer Multigroomer - MN9X is designed to give you complete grooming convenience.It comes with 11 versatile accessories for trimming and shaving beard, hair, nose, ears, and body. Equipped with high-quality stainless steel blades, it ensures precise and gentle hair removal. The waterproof (IPX7) design makes it safe for shower use, while the ergonomic build offers easy handling. With a powerful lithium battery, enjoy up to 90 minutes of cordless use on a single 90-minute charge, tracked with an LED display showing battery status and charging progress. A black storage bag, cleaning brush, and oil are included for practical upkeep.

title: Beurer Precision Trimmer - Mn2x
description: Beurer Precision Trimmer - Mn2x Is designed for quick and precise grooming, the Beurer MN2X Precision Trimmer comes with 3 attachments to trim and shape eyebrows, nose, and ear hair comfortably. Its high-quality stainless steel attachments ensure gentle hair removal, while the splash-proof (IPX4) design allows safe use and easy cleaning under running water. The set includes a mini blade with a comb attachment (3/6 mm) for eyebrow shaping, a nose and ear trimmer, protective caps, and a practical storage bag—perfect for both home and travel. Battery-operated, it comes ready to use with a 1.5V AA battery and cleaning brush.

title: Beurer Hair Clipper - Mn5x
description: Beurer Hair Clipper - Mn5x comes with 6 attachments and 6 adjustable cutting lengths, plus a 4-stage precision adjustment for individual results. Its high-quality stainless steel blade ensures fast, effective cutting and can be easily removed for hygienic cleaning under running water. Powered by a strong lithium battery, it delivers up to 4.5 hours of cordless use, with the option to operate directly from the mains. The clipper fully charges in 3.5 hours and features an LED display with battery, lock, and charging indicators, as well as a travel lock for added safety on the go.

title: Beurer Rotary Shaver - Mn8x
description: Beurer Rotary Shaver - Mn8x is designed for a smooth and comfortable shave with its 360° flexible shaving head that adapts to every facial contour. Built to IPX7 waterproof standards, it can be used safely in the shower for added convenience. Featuring a powerful fast-charging function, just 5 minutes of charging delivers 10 minutes of use . Its lithium battery provides up to 100 minutes of runtime after a full 120-minute charge, with an intuitive LED display to track battery status. The magnetic attachment system ensures quick accessory changes for easy handling and maintenance.

title: Beurer Beard Trimmer - Mn4x
description: Beurer Beard Trimmer - Mn4x is designed for precise and versatile beard styling. Equipped with titanium-coated stainless steel blades, it ensures a smooth cut while protecting the skin. With 10 adjustable cutting lengths (3–12 mm) and 2 fine adjustment levels (0.8 and 1.2 mm), it offers maximum flexibility to achieve your preferred style. The washable device and shaving head allow for easy, hygienic cleaning, while the powerful lithium battery delivers up to 90 minutes of cordless runtime after just 90 minutes of charging. An LED display clearly shows battery percentage and charging status. For added convenience, the trimmer comes with two comb attachments, a storage bag, cleaning brush, USB cable, and oil.

title: Isdin Acniben Repair Gentle Facial Cleanser Emulsion 180ml
description: Isdin Acniben Repair Gentle Facial Cleanser Emulsion 180ml is specially formulated for the daily care of dry and very dry skin that is irritated or weakened by acne treatments. With moisturizing and soothing active ingredients, this gentle emulsion not only soothes and calms the skin but also helps reduce skin reactivity and sensitivity. Betaine, with its emollient and soothing properties, helps calm the skin. And Rhamnosoft, with its anti-inflammatory and soothing properties, helps comfort and protect the skin. Combined with gentle cleansing agents that do not disrupt the skin during cleansing, this emulsion gently cleanses the skin without drying it out. All in all, it can help reduce symptoms of discomfort such as dryness and irritation, while also making it ideal for the daily cleansing of skin weakened by acne treatments. Indicated for the daily hygiene of skin subjected to anti-acne treatments. Its specific formula with calmoactive and trimethylglycine helps to reduce skin sensitivity and reactivity. Gently cleanses the skin. Perfume and preservative free. Soap-free.

title: Beurer Shaver -Hl 36
description: Beurer Shaver -Hl 36 is designed for smooth, irritation-free shaving with a flexible head that adapts to body contours. Suitable for wet & dry use (IPX7), it includes multiple attachments for trimming, shaving, and exfoliating. A hypoallergenic foil ensures gentle results, while the lithium-ion battery provides long-lasting cordless use. Features include dual-speed settings, a bright LED light, and an ergonomic non-slip handle perfect for precise, comfortable grooming at home or on the go.

title: Uriage Roseliane Visible Redness Neutralizing Care Cream 40ml
description: Uriage Roseliane Visible Redness Neutralizing Care Cream 40ml reduces and helps prevent redness. Formulated with key dermatological ingredients - red algae, ceramides and vitamin E - it provides immediate, long-lasting soothing relief from heating and tightness sensations. Effective immediately. The combination of the tlr2-regul complex and the sk5r complex (specific-kallikrein-5-regulator) regulates the activity of kallikrein-5, the protease responsible for inflammation and vascular problems, for a powerful soothing effect. Light texture with neutralizing green pearls. Dermatologically tested on sensitive skin prone to couperosis. Recommended by dermatologists. Visible signs: visible redness, heating sensation, discomfort. Key ingredients: Red Algae + Ceramides + vitamin E. Result: skin is even and moisturized. Immediate comfort.

title: Beurer Precision Trimmer - HR 2000
description: Beurer Precision Trimmer - HR 2000 is designed for safe, precise, and irritation-free grooming of eyebrows, nose, and ear hair. Its high-quality vertical stainless steel blade ensures a clean cut without pulling, while the extra comb attachment allows trimming at 3 or 6 mm for perfectly shaped brows. The removable head makes cleaning easy under running water, and its splash-proof design ensures hygienic use. Compact and battery-powered, it’s the perfect everyday and travel grooming tool

title: My Rose Shower Gel Refreshing 220ml
description: My Rose Shower Gel Refreshing 220ml is a tempting gentle gel that washes and hydrates. The added panthenol and allantoin make the skin smooth and silky soft. With a natural extract of the Bulgarian Rosa Damascena, rich in vitamins, microelements and antioxidants for a soothing and refreshing effect. Gives a feeling of freshness and leaves an incredible aroma. In the heart of Bulgaria. The flowers of the roses are collected by hand, at sunrise, before they bloom. This is how, ones of the most valuable ingredients of the cosmetics industry is preserved and passed on: the rose oil and extract. Known as the queen of flowers, Rosa Damascena the inspirer of stories of eternal youth and gives an irresistible fragrance. The action of the My Rose of Bulgaria products is due to the natural extract of the Bulgarian Rosa Damascena. It has a number of proven, beneficial and highly valued effects on the skin: Regenerates the skin cells Soothes Nourishes Tones Antioxidant action.

title: My Rose Rose Water Refreshes & Soothes 220ml
description: My Rose Rose Water Refreshes & Soothes 220ml our refreshing and soothing spray for the face, décolleté and body, contains natural rose water from the Bulgarian Rosa Damascena, rich in microdroplets of essential oil, which penetrate, moisturize and soothe the skin. Rose water is a rich source of antioxidants that protect the skin from the harmful effects of the environment. Thanks to the captivating scent of the precious rose oil, using this spray is a pleasure. Gives an instantly refreshing feeling of comfort, anywhere and anytime.

title: My Rose Anti-age effect, Nourishing Night Cream 50ml
description: My Rose Anti-age effect, Nourishing Night Cream 50ml it p rovides night care for deep nourishment of the skin and acts against cell aging. The formula of the cream has added hyaluronic acid, which deeply hydrates and smoothes the skin, stimulating the synthesis of collagen and elastin. Additionally enriched with vitamins vitamins A, E and panthenol for radiant and healthy skin. With a natural extract of the Bulgarian Rosa Damascena, rich in valuable substances, microelements and antioxidants for a soothing and nourishing effect. Regenerates the skin and restores its natural glow. The cream has a rich, pleasant to use and dense texture that absorbs quickly without leaving greasy traces. Universal formula for normal skin.

title: My Rose Micellar Rose Water Removes Makeup, Cleans, Refreshes 420ml
description: My Rose Micellar Rose Water Removes Makeup, Cleans, Refreshes 420ml is designed to clean makeup from the face, eyes and lips. Gently cleanses, soothes and refreshes the skin. Easily removes accumulated dirt and grease, thanks to the special mycelium technology. A formula that preserves the natural water balance and physiological pH of the skin. Additionally, enriched with the natural extract of Bulgarian Rosa Damascena, rich in vitamins, microelements and antioxidants. This formula doesn’t need additional rinsing. No added perfume – as delicate as possible to the skin.

title: My Rose Soft Touch Feeling Hand Cream 75ml

The delicate and pleasant texture of the cream absorbs quickly leaving no greasy traces.

title: My Rose Face Wash Gently Exfoliates Refreshes 150ml
description: My Rose Face Wash Gently Exfoliates Refreshes 150ml have a g entle and pleasant gel that foams lightly, delicately exfoliates and deeply cleanses the face and neck. The included exfoliating particles remove dead skin cells. The added natural extract of the Bulgarian Rosa Damascena is rich in vitamins, microelements and antioxidants. It has a calming and nourishing effect. The formula is enriched with glycerin, which moisturizes and makes the skin soft and smooth. Suitable for daily use, giving a unique refreshing feeling with every wash.

title: My Rose Eye Cream Anti-Age & Dark Circles 20ml
description: My Rose Eye Cream Anti-Age & Dark Circles 20ml provides essential care for the skin around the eyes, smoothes, hydrates and improves elasticity. As the fragrance develops, the heart notes of pink freesia, jasmine, and rose bud create a bouquet of delicate floral aromas that are both timeless and contemporary. Vetiver brings a smoky, virile elegance to the base note of the fragrance, as it dries down and lingers seductively on the skin. Created by perfumer Bruno Jovanovic, BOSS The Scent Absolute is a sophisticated, captivating Oriental amber fragrance.
